setNode.title: Clamperl of Wisdom
setNode.description: Our heroes reconnect with an unlucky Spoink, and it's still having trouble holding onto its pearl!

setNode.title: The Relicanth Really Can
setNode.description: Ash and friends join a treasure hunter to explore the deep sea, but Team Rocket is right behind them!

setNode.title: The Evolutionary War
setNode.description: When a Gorebyss-versus-Huntail rivalry develops between two islands, our heroes must get to the bottom of it!

setNode.title: Training Wrecks
setNode.description: The residents of Muscle Island are dedicated to physical fitness—but can they keep up with Ash in a Pokémon battle?

setNode.title: Gaining Groudon
setNode.description: After a rescue at sea, our heroes find themselves aboard Team Magma's submarine and learn more about the group's plan for world domination!

setNode.title: The Scuffle of Legends
setNode.description: Team Aqua and Team Magma have awakened the ancient Legendary Pokémon Groudon and Kyogre! Can Ash and friends escape?

setNode.title: It's Still Rocket Roll To Me
setNode.description: A Team Rocket strike on Mossdeep City drags our heroes—plus the city's twin Gym Leaders—into a space-shuttle scheme!

setNode.title: Solid As A Solrock
setNode.description: Ash takes on the Mossdeep Gym, going up against two Gym Leaders at once!

setNode.title: Vanity Affair
setNode.description: After winning his seventh Gym badge, Ash can't stop bragging about his battle skills…until he runs into a member of the Elite Four!

setNode.title: Where's Armaldo?
setNode.description: In an island nature preserve, Ash and friends come face to face with several Pokémon thought to be extinct!

setNode.title: A Cacturne For The Worse
setNode.description: May competes in a Pokémon Contest, where another Coordinator tries to sabotage her performance!

setNode.title: Claydol Big And Tall
setNode.description: When our heroes discover an enormous Poké Ball on an island, Team Rocket's meddling unleashes an ancient destructive force!

setNode.title: Once In A Mawile
setNode.description: Ash and friends meet a talented Trainer who performs a ribbon dance with her Mawile…until Team Rocket gets in the way!

setNode.title: Beg, Burrow and Steal
setNode.description: To help a local researcher, our heroes explore a massive underground labyrinth created by a group of Trapinch…and get into some trouble along the way!

setNode.title: Absol-Ute Disaster
setNode.description: An Absol appears to warn a village of danger, but the villagers think it's the one causing the trouble! Can our heroes clear up this misunderstanding?

setNode.title: Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snorunt
setNode.description: When a mischievous Snorunt steals Ash's hard-earned Gym badges, Ash chases after it—right into a raging snowstorm!

setNode.title: Do I Hear A Ralts?
setNode.description: Max finds an injured Ralts and tries to get it to a Pokémon Center, but its friends Gardevoir and Kirlia think our heroes are trying to steal it!

setNode.title: The Great Eight Fate!
setNode.description: Ash gets ready for his final Gym battle in the Hoenn region: a Double Battle against Gym Leader Juan, who used to be a Pokémon Coordinator!

setNode.title: Eight Ain't Enough
setNode.description: Ash and Juan battle it out in the Sootopolis Gym! Can Ash win his eighth Gym badge to qualify for the Hoenn League?

setNode.title: Showdown At Linoone!
setNode.description: When May discovers that two of her Poké Balls are missing, she naturally assumes it's Team Rocket! But the culprit could be someone else entirely…

setNode.title: Who, What, When, Where, Wynaut?
setNode.description: When Team Rocket interrupts a practice battle between May and her rival Drew, our heroes and their Pokémon have to sort out a big mix-up!

setNode.title: Date Expectations
setNode.description: Our heroes are delayed by a herd of Donphan on their way to Pacifidlog Town! Can May make it onto the ferry in time for her final Pokémon Contest?

setNode.title: Mean With Envy
setNode.description: May enters the Pacifidlog Contest, where she goes up against rivals Joshua and Erica, plus a mysterious competitor known only as The Jester…

setNode.title: Pacifidlog Jam
setNode.description: May competes against an unusual Meowth in the second round of the Pacifidlog Contest. Can she win the last ribbon she needs to qualify for the Grand Festival?

setNode.title: Berry, Berry Interesting
setNode.description: When our heroes stumble upon a wonderful berry harvest, May takes the opportunity to make some Pokéblocks for the Grand Festival, drawing the attention of a hungry Munchlax!

setNode.title: Less Is Morrison
setNode.description: Ash meets Morrison, another Trainer who's on his way to compete in the Hoenn League, and the two immediately become fierce rivals!

setNode.title: The Ribbon Cup Caper!
setNode.description: Aboard a luxury liner bound for Slateport City and the Grand Festival, our heroes must help Officer Jenny catch a master thief!

setNode.title: Hi Ho Silver Wind!
setNode.description: On the first day of the Grand Festival, May runs into her deceitful rival Harley once more!

setNode.title: Deceit And Assist
setNode.description: Ash meets a Coordinator whose ribbons have been stolen, and May listens to some bad advice before her first performance in the Grand Festival!

setNode.title: Rhapsody In Drew
setNode.description: May is up against Harley in the second round of the Grand Festival! Can she triumph over his treacherous tactics?

setNode.title: Island Time
setNode.description: When our heroes win free tickets to Ever Grande City for the Hoenn League Championships, they're delighted—until it becomes clear this is another of Team Rocket's schemes!

setNode.title: Like A Meowth To A Flame
setNode.description: While training for the Hoenn League, Ash meets fellow Trainer Tyson and his Meowth in boots, and they discover that the ceremonial torch has been stolen!

setNode.title: Saved By The Beldum
setNode.description: Ash, Morrison, and Tyson register for the Hoenn League, and it appears that Tyson's Meowth has an unfortunate past…

setNode.title: From Brags To Riches
setNode.description: In the qualifying rounds, Ash faces a serious challenge: he has to win three matches in a row, and each match is a Double Battle!

setNode.title: Shocks and Bonds
setNode.description: Ash has made it through the qualifying rounds, but now he faces an impressive Trainer named Katie in a full battle, where both of them will use all six of their Pokémon!

setNode.title: A Judgment Brawl
setNode.description: Ash has fallen behind in his full battle against Katie! Can he recover and make it to the second round?

setNode.title: Choose It Or Lose It!
setNode.description: Ash faces his friend and rival Morrison in the second round of the Hoenn League!

setNode.title: At The End Of The Fray
setNode.description: Ash goes up against his rival Tyson in the quarterfinals of the Hoenn League!

setNode.title: The Scheme Team
setNode.description: The Hoenn League is over, and it's time for Ash to bid farewell to his traveling companions and head home—but he can't resist one more challenge from a Gym Leader along the way!

setNode.title: The Right Place And The Right Mime
setNode.description: Max and May come to visit Ash in Pallet Town, along with Misty and Brock, and they all make plans for another journey together—this time, to the Battle Frontier!

setNode.title: A Real Cleffa-Hanger
setNode.description: Our heroes stop for a picnic at the base of Mt. Moon, where they encounter the rarely seen Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable!

setNode.title: Numero Uno Articuno
setNode.description: On the way to Ash's first match at the Battle Frontier, our heroes see the Legendary Pokémon Articuno flying through a snowstorm!

setNode.title: The Symbol Life
setNode.description: Ash calls in his old friend Charizard to help in his battle against Frontier Brain Noland and his friend Articuno!

setNode.title: Hooked on Onix
setNode.description: Provoked by Team Rocket, hordes of Rock-type Pokémon attack our heroes on their way to the Battle Arena!

setNode.title: Rough, Tough Jigglypuff
setNode.description: Ash and friends fall into a trap set by a man who wants to catch a Jigglypuff for his daughter's birthday!

setNode.title: On Cloud Arcanine
setNode.description: May and her rival Drew go after the same Arcanine, both hoping to catch it for their next Contest!

setNode.title: Sitting Psyduck
setNode.description: Ash and friends rescue a sad Psyduck from a group of Fighting types, but they can't figure out how to cheer it up…

setNode.title: Hail To The Chef!
setNode.description: Our heroes and Team Rocket check out a new restaurant owned by two sisters who can't stop squabbling!

setNode.title: A Fresh Breeze at Raimon Junior High!
setNode.description: Arion Sherwind lives for Football, so there's only one place for him: Raimon Junior High -- the school that won the world title ten years ago. On his first morning at Raimon, Arion is so excited that he skips the opening ceremony and rushes to check out the action on the Football pitch, but there he finds the team's members fallen and battered. A mysterious boy is standing among them. Raimon Football is dead, he says, Who needs Football, anyway? Arion finds himself challenging the boy for the future of the team, but he's no match for the skill and power of this mysterious stranger...

setNode.title: The Elusive Fighting Spirits!
setNode.description: When Arion manages to steal the ball from the mysterious Victor Blade, Victor aims a furious shot at him. But that ball is suddenly knocked off course by another from Riccardo Di Rigo, captain of the Raimon team, who stands together with the varsity Raimon Eleven. Victor smirks and declares that he and his Order of Black Templars, sent by an organization called Fifth Sector, will be the new Raimon Eleven, and a Football battle ensues over the right to bear that name. The Order of Black Templars' onslaught is relentless, with Victor Blade using his Special moves to score over and over again.  Raimon seems doomed when suddenly Coach Percival makes the stunning decision to send the newcomer, Arion, into the match...

setNode.title: The Fall of the Raimon Football Team!
setNode.description: There is a legend in Football that a skilled player's energy, when it's in perfect focus, can take visible form -- a Fighting Spirits. The legend proves true when Victor Blade reveals his own Fighting Spirits. But Riccardo, pushed to the limit, inspired by Arion, and determined to save the Raimon Football tradition, summons his own fighting spirit and blocks Victor's unblockable shot. Victor and Riccardo prepare to clash when the game is suddenly declared over. The Order of Black Templars depart, vowing to return again, leaving the Raimon Football team in shambles. With Fifth Sector looming over them, many members quit, yet Arion still wants to join. What will Riccardo do?

setNode.title: Can Arion Make the Grade?
setNode.description: Out of nowhere, Victor is given a spot on the Raimon Football team without undergoing tryouts, and the team is not happy. The upperclassmen entrusted Riccardo with the job of team captain, but how can he protect the Raimon Football club in a world where Fifth Sector decides the outcome of every game? Arion and J.P. wake up early to prepare for their tryouts, but get so caught up in training that they show up late! Many different emotions well up in the older members as they watch the two boys train relentlessly, refusing to waste time even to enjoy recess or eat lunch. Victor is among them, but when Arion plainly states his desire to make the team, Victor says only, Do whatever you like.

setNode.title: The Fix Is In
setNode.description: A frustrated Riccardo cranks up the pressure for the Football tryouts, but Arion and J.P. fight on, and earn a place on the team. When classes end, the two rush off to their first official practice, but a strange tension hangs over the team. Arion is dazzled by the skill of the older players, and resolves to improve his own game. Meanwhile, the head of the school briefs Coach Travis on the first game of the season against Prodigy Grammar School, informing him of Fifth Sector's decision: Raimon must lose the game, 0 - 3...

setNode.title: One Last Pass, One Last Hope
setNode.description: The Raimon vs. Prodigy Grammar School match begins, and Prodigy Grammar School scores the first goal. Arion and J.P. fight harder, yet Prodigy Grammar School scores again. How could Sam, Raimon's brilliant goalkeeper, let this happen? And it's not just him -- none of the upperclassmen are playing their best. When the first half ends, a frustrated Arion confronts the older players. Finally Celia reveals the ugly truth: Defying Fifth Sector would mean the end of Raimon Football. Stunned and confused, Arion hears the whistle blow, and the second half begins...

setNode.title: Enter Coach Evans!
setNode.description: Percival Travis is fired for defying the orders of Fifth Sector. He leaves Raimon, telling Arion to keep fighting the good fight. Meanwhile, Riccardo, devastated by the loss of the coach he trusted, goes into seclusion. The entire team is feeling low as they meet their new coach: none other than the legendary Mark Evans! When Coach Evans announces they are going to practice to win, the players are suspicious. Is this really the coach sent by Fifth Sector? Coach Evans tells the team to meet him at the old pitch by the river, but only Arion and J.P. show up...

setNode.title: What It Takes To Be Captain
setNode.description: The Saints Way tournament approaches, a contest that decides which junior high school has the best Football team in the nation. Arion and J.P. watch a video of last year's final match between Raimon and Kirkwood Junior High and see the players giving it their all -- even under Fifth Sector rules, it seems, there are still rare games where the outcome isn't decided in advance. The newly energized team begins practice, but Riccardo remains in seclusion. He feels certain that Coach Evans will have to give in to Fifth Sector sooner or later, and so he resigns as team captain. Meanwhile, Coach Evans is told what the score of the first match of the tournament must be...

setNode.title: And the Saints Way Tournament Begins!
setNode.description: With the regional rounds of the Saints Way tournament just days away, the Raimon Eleven are practicing hard. Riccardo has returned to the team, but his determination is shaken when Victor lets him know what the outcome of the first match is to be. What should he do? Then Coach Evans tells the team his surprising plan for the match against Milky Way Charter School. Worried that the scheme could lead to the end of their beloved Football team, the players leave the clubhouse one by one. Hoping to cheer up Arion, Sam invites him to his home, but ends up telling him how painful it has been to play regulated football...

setNode.title: A Rebellion for Victory!
setNode.description: The first regional round of the Saints Way tournament is underway. In defiance of Fifth Sector's orders, Riccardo scores the first goal against Milky Way Charter School and vows that Raimon will win the match -- but the other players refuse to follow his lead,  afraid of the possible consequences. Milky Way Charter School takes control of the game by playing rough, and though Arion and a few others fight back with everything they've got, Milky Way Charter School midfielder Zaphod Riker uses his fighting spirits to even the score. Zaphod Riker mocks Riccardo for not being able to control his own fighting spirits, but when he tells Sam, A loser like you could never block my shot...

setNode.title: Victor's Secret
setNode.description: The Raimon Eleven have won the first match of the Saints Way tournament! While Arion is thrilled, others fear the team will be crushed for defying Fifth Sector. The team is split, with Arion, J.P., Riccardo, and Sam determined to fight, and everyone else resolved to swallow their pride and save the club. The two groups even practice separately! Meanwhile, Victor heads to an unexpected place to meet with a certain individual, but is summoned by the Holy Emperor of Fifth Sector. After hearing what the Emperor has to say, Victor decides he must destroy Raimon once and for all. He demands that Coach Evans put him in the next game...

setNode.title: Almighty Faith School's Fighting Spirits!
setNode.description: The instant the match begins, Victor steals the ball and shoots...right into Raimon's own goal! Unless someone else scores, the game will end exactly as Fifth Sector ordered. Kaiser(Michael Ballzack) pleads with Riccardo to give up, but he is determined to win. Raimon's faithful four fight on, but they're helpless without the support of their teammates. Almighty Faith School attacks the divided Raimon players without mercy. The Almighty Faith School Seed players (agents sent by Fifth Sector) use brutal tactics to take out the divided Raimon team one by one -- even Riccardo falls. But one player refuses to stay down: Arion Matsukaze...

setNode.title: Raimon's Awakening!
setNode.description: Determined to destroy Raimon, the Almighty Faith School players will even risk crippling their opponents. The sight of this triggers an emotional change in Victor. With no help from most of the team, Riccardo and the others struggle against Almighty Faith School's relentless onslaught. Raimon gives up another goal, and though they continue to fight the odds, they just can't hold on to the ball. Almighty Faith School goes on the offensive, firing shot after shot. Sam continues to protect the goal, but he is getting worn down...

setNode.title: J.P.'s Special Move!
setNode.description: The Raimon Eleven, all finally working together as a real team, defeat Almighty Faith School! But Fifth Sector strikes back, using Victor's sick brother to stop his rebellion and blackmail him into obeying once again. Meanwhile, J.P., inspired by the amazing techniques of the older players, is determined to improve his game. With the help of Arion, he begins to develop a special move of his own that utilizes his incredible jumping ability. Riccardo and the team are now united in their desire to keep winning and restore the game of Football to its former glory, but playing in open defiance of Fifth Sector will not be easy. The team practices harder than ever, and J.P., struggling to keep up, finally perfects his special technique...

setNode.title: A Reunion with Jude Sharp
setNode.description: As Raimon prepares for its scheduled regional semifinal match with Ivy Selective College, they receive startling news: Raimon has been moved to another bracket in the tournament! Their new opponent is Royal Academy, a team Raimon has faced before in several intense matches. The academy is rumored to have multiple players who can summon spirits, but Riccardo is determined to win. He wants to try out a special tactic he's been developing -- Ultimate Thunder -- but it requires a powerful striker, and the team can't make it work. Meanwhile, Coach Evans is surprised when he learns the name of Royal Academy's new coach...

setNode.title: The Dreaded Royal Academy!
setNode.description: The match begins, and Sam just barely manages to block a shot on goal -- Royal Academy is proving to be unlike any other team Raimon has faced. Riccardo's Thunderbolt remains unperfected, and even when Raimon gets a chance to shoot, they fail in the face of the academy's iron defense. The team makes a desperate attempt at Ultimate Thunder, but to no avail. Even Riccardo's special move shots are easily stopped by the academy goalkeeper. What's more, Royal Academy finds a weakness in Raimon's formation, keeping them on the defensive. Meanwhile, Victor visits his brother in the hospital...

setNode.title: Thunderbolt Roars!
setNode.description: Raimon attempts a comeback using their super tactic, but end up surrendering a goal to Royal Academy instead. Raimon's offense is powerless in the face of Royal Academy's overwhelming special moves -- even a shot from Riccardo's fighting spirit is deflected. Raimon tries Ultimate Thunder again, and again it fails. A Royal Academy fighting spirit scores another goal, but as the second half begins, an unexpected person appears before the beleaguered Raimon team...

setNode.title: Revolution!
setNode.description: The day after their blistering battle in the regional semifinals, the Raimon players are ordered to meet at Royal Academy. There, they learn the stunning truth behind their match with the academy. The players are then lead to a secret area beneath the school, where a special someone is waiting for them. The time has come for the Inazuma Eleven to learn what is going on, and what is to come...

setNode.title: The Gnashing Fangs of Pirates Cove (Merchant Marine) Academy!
setNode.description: Determined to free Football from the clutches of Fifth Sector, the Raimon Eleven prepare to revolt. With the regional championship against Pirates Cove Merchant Marine Academy Academy coming up, morale is high, and losing is not an option. Arion practices even harder as he attempts to develop a new special move, and the other players lend a hand -- the Raimon Eleven all stand united. Meanwhile, Willy Glass, who has been gathering intelligence on Pirates Cove (Merchant Marine) Academy, makes a discovery that surprises everyone...

setNode.title: Arion's Fighting Spirit Takes Wing!
setNode.description: The true revolution won't occur until the crowds watching are reminded of the power of real Football and decide to take a stand. The Raimon Eleven welcome back members who had quit, and the regional championship match begins. In the first few minutes, though, Raimon surrenders a goal to Pirates Cove (Merchant Marine) Academy's overwhelming offense. Raimon tightens their defense and manages to tie the game, but Pirates Cove Merchant Marine Academy is playing for keeps. Faced with amazing plays showing off the Seed players' strengths, as well as powerful attacks from Fighting Spirits, Sam cannot protect the goal. At halftime, the Raimon players are feeling bruised and beaten when Coach Evans proposes an unthinkable strategy...

setNode.title: Challenger in Autumn Sky
setNode.description: The Saints Way tournament is finally underway. Surrounded by powerful enemies sent by Fifth Sector, the matches ahead will be the toughest yet. So the team practices harder than ever, reminding themselves that no opponent is unbeatable. A new student comes to Raimon Junior High, asking to join the Football club. After seeing the newcomer demonstrate his defensive skills, the Raimon players are sure they've discovered a powerful new member, but something's not right...

setNode.title: Get together for the revolution!
setNode.description: After seeing the newcomer's strange behavior in a practice match with the residents of ''Windsor Manor' flats, Bagriel Garcia (Gabi) begins to suspect the boy may be a Seed agent sent by Fifth Sector. His inexplicable challenges to Bagriel Garcia (Gabi) fan these burning suspicions as the opening ceremony of the Saints Way tournament begins. Each game will be played in one of five randomly selected stadiums, and the massive scale of the venues has the Raimon Eleven excited. But when the team meets their opponents for the first round, they're surprised to see a familiar face...

setNode.title: Aerodrome Arena!
setNode.description: The first round of the Saints Way tournament gets underway at Aerodrome Arena. The Raimon Eleven are put on the defensive by Lunar Sea (Military) Academy's formations and attacks, which take full advantage of special contraptions unique to the venue. To make matters worse, the Raimon defense is thrown off by Bagriel Garcia (Gabi)'s lingering suspicions, and they give up a goal. Arion is the only Raimon player who seems to have mastered the stadium's quirks, yet even he is powerless against Lunar Sea (Military) Academy, who seems to already know the venue inside and out. Things look bad for Raimon at halftime, but Coach Evans proposes a bold new strategy as the second half begins...

setNode.title: Our Style of Football, Revived!
setNode.description: Raimon uses Aitor and Gabi's stellar tandem skills to combat Lunar Sea's tactical play. When Arion uses his Fighting Spirit to even the score, momentum shifts to Raimon. Facing a stiff challenge for the first time, Lunar Sea begins to crumble under the adversity. But Dodge, who so wanted to join the match that he quit Raimon, refuses to admit defeat. Lunar Sea is moved by his grit, and the teams go back and forth in a thrilling and unpredictable match! Near the end of full time, Aitor breaks loose for a scoring chance, and Dodge gives his all to stop him...

setNode.title: He's Back!
setNode.description: Following in Aitor's footsteps, a new player tries out for Raimon. Coaches Evans and Sharp see his love for the game and readily accept him, and despite having only two months experience, he quickly integrates himself with the team. His performance also causes Riccardo and the others to recall their own early years at Raimon. Meanwhile, the team learns their next Saints' Way opponent is Hokkaido's Alpine Junior High. Highly skilled on both sides of the ball, Alpine is also renowned for sportsmanship and fair play on the pitch. But as Raimon begins a spirited practice, a surprising figure appears...

setNode.title: The White Devil Looms
setNode.description: Alpine has fallen under the control of Fifth Sector, and Raimon is tasked with rescuing them. Knowing that Alpine's stout defence can stand up against Thunderbolt, Raimon prepares a surprising new tactical play. But the match takes place in Ice Place Arena, and the slick pitch prevents Raimon from gaining a solid footing. Alpine's players, however, are used to the conditions, giving them an early advantage...

setNode.title: The Alpine Struggle!
setNode.description: Alpine strikerNjord Snio's special shot gives the team an early lead. While Raimon has mastered using spikes to run across the icy pitch, their new tactical play is powerless against Alpine's masterful skills. WhenNjord Snio fires off another shot with his Fighting Spirit, it easily breaches Raimon's defences, and Alpine takes a two-goal lead into halftime. However, a chance suggestion convinces Coach Evans to put in the player who devised the idea, and with the help of Victor, the team attempts a bold new strategy...

setNode.title: Anxiety of Headcoach Jude
setNode.description: After their ferocious match against Alpine, Coach Evans makes an announcement that rocks Arion and the rest of Raimon. Soon thereafter, the team starts a new training regimen that prevents them from touching the ball. The scheme also requires players to perform different tasks, and works them to the point of exhaustion. This is too much for Raimon, and as the tiring practice continues, they fear the team may be ripped apart. In the midst of all this, J.P. declares that he is through with practice...

setNode.title: Challenge Against Kirkwood!
setNode.description: Raimon finds their core skills improving thanks to their coach's new training scheme. But while the team is committed to making their revolution happen, Arion and J.P. face trouble with a new special move. Even remembering Roma's Italy experiences and using  pasta as a keyword isn't enough for a breakthrough. Meanwhile, their next Saints' Way opponent is announced as Kirkwood Junior High, the team that beat Raimon in last year's hard-fought championship. And while it's unclear if Kirkwood will follow Fifth Sector's orders or join the revolution, a victory would still provide momentum for the struggle. But as the questions mount, the Holy Emperor sends a surprising new coach to the Kirkwood side...

setNode.title: Tactical Confrontation! Love vs. Sharp!
setNode.description: As the match begins, the stadium's unique gimmick proves an unexpected obstacle for both teams. The Kirkwood side, however, is united under their coach's words: If we beat Raimon, we can see the road ahead. Freshly motivated, they use their tactical play to avoid the obstacles and put Raimon on the defensive. Coach Sharp then takes a hint from J.P.'s moves and devises cunning countermeasures that take advantage of the other side's tactics. But just as the tide seems to be turning, Kirkwood unleashes a Fighting Spirit and scores a goal. Meanwhile, Roma is heartbroken to miss a clear shot on goal as a certain someone stares coldly at him...

setNode.title: Brave Samurai Musashi Arrives!
setNode.description: As the second half begins, Roma manages to even the score. And while Raimon starts to find its flow,Langford Ash's selfish play threatens to rip Kirkwood apart. The coach calls for a substitution, but instead of benching Langoford Ash, he sends his brother Bradford Ash in to deliver a message. Even this is not enough to sway Langoford Ash, who believes that his skill and Fighting Spirit are enough to overwhelm Raimon. But thanks to J.P., Kirkwood is unable to take advantage. As Langford Ash sees his team's chances crumble around him, he runs toward Arion, who is waiting with his Fighting Spirit...

setNode.title: Winds of Revolution
setNode.description: After a pitched battle against Kirkwood, Arion and the rest of Raimon train for their next match. The team undergoes a trial-and-error process with J.P., who is attempting to gain a Fighting Spirit in order to better contribute. Suddenly, Riccardo appears to report that Milky Way Charter and Almighty Faith--teams they defeated in regional play--now support Raimon's football revolution. This causes the team to think about how they are affecting others, and also ask some hard questions. What kind of world does Fifth Sector want with their iron-fisted control of football? And what are Fighting Spirits, anyway? Riccardo claims that all will become clear at the end of Saints' Way, and wistfully wishes the departed Coach Evans could see Raimon now...

setNode.title: Foes in the Mirage!
setNode.description: Raimon's quarterfinal opponent in Saints' Way is Mirage Middle School, but while the team trains for the match, Wan-Chang's heart isn't in it. He's troubled both by his previous lineup demotion and Mirage striker Harrold Houdini, who was a childhood  friend. These thoughts prove too distracting for the practice pitch, and he is finally sent off by Coach Sharp. But Wan-Chang soon receives a visit from Harrold Houdini himself, who promises to follow Fifth Sector's orders and put down Raimon's revolution once and for all. His hopes of reconciliation dashed, Wan-Chang finds his love of football waning. And while Luke is concerned for Wan-Chang's well-being, a young girl suddenly appears before him...

setNode.title: The Unstoppable Phantom Shot!
setNode.description: The Mirage challenge begins with Wan-Chang in the starting line-up,  and he sees the match as a chance to tell Harrold how he feels. Luke, meanwhile, is unable to give Wan-Chang the news he learned from the mysterious girl. On the pitch, Raimon's attempts to gain the upper hand are stymied by tricks and traps around the stadium. Mirage, meanwhile, uses the obstacles to their advantage, and Harrold's shot breaks through Wan-Chang's defence and into the net. Harrold claims no one can defend against him, but Wan-Chang vows he is up to the task. As Mirage dominates the first half, Harrold begins to grow more and more agitated...

setNode.title: A Shocking Keeper Switch!
setNode.description: Coach Sharp realizes how to take advantage of the stadium, and his new tactics give Raimon a quick second-half equalizer. Meanwhile, Wan-Chang finally learns the truth of his past from a primary-school friend. He boldly confronts Harrold in an attempt to salvage their friendship, but the striker claims his only mission is to halt Raimon's rebellion. He then summons his Fighting Spirit and presses the attack. After Luke's equalizer, Raimon is unable to score against Mirage's new keeper, and the seemingly invincible Harrold eventually lands another shot in Raimon's net. Though initially crestfallen, Wan-Chang quickly regains his spirit thanks to the encouragement of Luke and his friends. But then Coach Sharp shocks the team with a keeper change of his own...

setNode.title: A Fateful Reunion
setNode.description: Raimon has finally advanced to the Saints' Way semi-finals. Their next opponent, Universal Middle School, is said to have perfect players gifted in all aspects of football. As the team figures out how to oppose them, they learn that schools who joined the rebellion against Fifth Sector are being shut down. The team sees this as a sign that Fifth Sector is growing concerned, but Arion is less pleased; the last thing he wants is for other players to be denied the joy of football. As he battles these feelings, a girl appears and asks him to meet someone. Guided by her words, Arion heads for the park and finds a surprising visitor...

setNode.title: The Glasswork Genius
setNode.description: Arion sets aside his anxiety, rekindles his passion for football, and devotes himself to practice once more. Meanwhile, Sam invites J.P. to try goalkeeping after seeing his performance on the pitch. However, as their former coach, Mark Evans, did a masterful job in the net, J.P. is unconvinced he's ready for the job. Celia shows him Mark's GK practice machine and suggests he uses it to train--an idea that excites J.P. As he practices to the point of exhaustion, a certain figure watches from the shadows...

setNode.title: Sun Spirit Unleashed!
setNode.description: The day of the Saints' Way semi-final is here! Raimon, confident in their quest to restore real football, takes on the perfect Universal Middle School. But Arion sees a familiar face on the opposing sideline: Sol Daystar, a frail boy from the hospital who was supposed to be banned from physical activity. Sol Daystar claims that watching Arion play made him unable to contain his excitement toward football, and swears his illness will not stop him from beating Raimon. In response, Arion vows to grant him no quarter. Sol Daystar is more than an adept ball-handler in the shifting sands of Shifting Sands Arena--he is, in fact, Universal's best player, and a once-in-a-decade talent...

setNode.title: Arion vs. Sol Daystar
setNode.description: Victor has shocking words for Arion: You're the only one on Raimon who isn't playing seriously right now. Arion wonders if it's because of his concern for Sol Daystar, whose illness makes him too weak to withstand the rigors of the game. Shaken by anxiety, Arion kicks off in a tied second half. New sub Luke pushes hard, but is eventually blocked by Sol Daystar. Raimon finds it difficult to maintain their frenetic pace, and soon find themselves down a goal. Sol Daystar may not appear in the next match--or even be able to play tomorrow--but he still gives his all for the joy of the game. When Arion realizes that Sol Daystar's serious approach to football symbolizes Raimon's play, he shakes off his worries, takes a pass from Riccardo, and starts running...

setNode.title: Arion, The New Captain!
setNode.description: The match against Universal is over, and Riccardo, who fell during the game, is undergoing emergency surgery. This puts the team captain out for the upcoming Saints' Way championship, a major blow to Raimon's hopes. The team quickly loses its spark, and practice turns into a dull, emotionless affair. Their foe in the final is the seemingly invincible Mount Olympus High, a team led by Fifth Sector leader Alex Zabel. Victory appears so improbable that even thoughts of Riccardo are unable to raise Raimon's spirits. But after a certain shocking proposal, Arion and the others are finally motivated to take action...

setNode.title: Showdown in Zenith Stadium! (Broadcast February 22)
setNode.description: A battered Victor tells a surprised Arion they must learn a certain special move if they hope to win. As Arion guides Raimon as captain, he secretly engages in a series of gruelling practices right up to the night before the championship. Victor then speaks of his confidence in Arion--as he was the one who led him back to football, he's sure they will succeed together. But while Victor unearths a new bit of news, Seymour and the rest of the resistance delve into Fifth Sector's secrets and discover a mysterious DRAGON LINK plan...

setNode.title: DRAGON LINK, The Ultimate Foe!
setNode.description: The Saints' Way championship, the match that decides who becomes the next Holy Emperor, is finally here! An evenly fought first half ends with Fifth Sector's strongest and the freedom fighters of Raimon tied--a development that pleases Raimon to no end. The rival captain demands his team play for the pride of the invincible Mount Olympus, while Arion swears to honour the Raimon name. Coach Evans then tells Arion that a captain's skill is needed most at a team's darkest hour. These words give Arion pause, as he is unsure he can live up to Riccardo's past heroics. Meanwhile, Alex, who serves as coach for Mount Olympus, is ordered to leave the team by a certain someone...

setNode.title: The Final Holy War!
setNode.description: The second half begins with all of Mount Olympus' players substituted out. Gyan Cinquedea, creator of Fifth Sector, serves as coach, and Raimon is now faced with his DRAGON LINK team. The team finds themselves pummelled by Fighting Spirit attacks, causing Sam to block four consecutive shots before falling. When J.P. is forced to take over as keeper, the team tries to hold the ball from the opposing strikers, but the other keeper's Fighting Spirit blocks Raimon's attack. It turns out every member of DRAGON LINK has a Fighting Spirit, and they aren't afraid to use them! As Raimon falls behind, captain Arion formulates a new strategy to deal with the DRAGON LINK spirits...

setNode.title: Bring Our Game to the Heavens!
setNode.description: Arion's anti-DRAGON LINK strategy fails, causing more damage to Raimon than the opposing team. Losing confidence and feeling worthless, Arion is ready to surrender when a certain someone suddenly appeals to him. And when Coach Evans demands to know how Arion wants to play, he responds by declaring that he wants to play real football, driven by the purest of emotions--the kind of football Raimon always plays. Touched by this, the rest of the team readies itself for action. Determined to triumph at all costs, Raimon sets off for the final battle against DRAGON LINK...

setNode.title: Pass to the Future!
setNode.description: The battle against DRAGON LINK is over, and the world of football is free once more. Because Raimon's team of skilled players trusted in each other, they restored the ultimate kind of football. And now, as Raimon sweats it out in practice, they are pleased to see a certain person visit the pitch. Clutching the ball that brought him this far, Arion runs off for practice. But when he passes by Skie, they pause to recall the day they met, when a fresh-faced Arion tried out for the junior side...

setNode.title: – Smile—We’re on TV!
setNode.description: The fiercely contested Saints’ Way final is finally over, and the TV cameras have come to Raimon to film a special about Arion and the team who have breathed new life into the game of football. What are the secrets behind Raimon’s success? The programme takes a look back at past games and episodes in an attempt to explain the magic behind the myth. The river bank, where legendary special moves such as Arion’s Easy Breezy were born, the “three goddesses”—manageresses Skie, Jade and Rosie—who have supported them throughout their championship bid, and finally...the inimitable Raimon spirit, inherited from the legendary Mark Evans himself! The team watch the programme detailing these three pillars of their footballing approach, and reminisce about a truly unforgettable season.

setNode.title: Raimon: Origins
setNode.description: Continuing on from the previous episode’s look at the current Raimon team, this time we take a look at the history of Raimon’s football club, as told by Coach Evans. We learn about how the club was founded, and of the original team’s journey all the way from complete obscurity to success at the Football Frontier International tournament, and the world number-one spot. Arion and friends are struck by the realisation that without those who came before them, they wouldn’t be where they are today, and the team vow to keep the club and the Raimon spirit alive no matter what.

setNode.title: Geronimo Stilton - Episode 1
setNode.description:
Ravenrat

Hey there fellow anime fans! This is Mike!

When viewing this episode, touch the banner on the Touch Screen of your system to land directly on the eShop product's page to learn more about our offers!

setNode.title: Shin Chan Episode 8
setNode.description:
Hey, Himawari Is a Princess! 
Himawari is Princess Thumbeline and, if they want to marry her, her suitors must bring one of the jewels of the terrible White Snake.

Hey, It’s Mommy First Gray Hair! 
Shin chan finds a gray hair on Misae’s head and she gets extremely upset.

Hey, Michi and Yoshirin Are Moving! 
One Sunday morning, a removal truck fills the Noharas’ garden with boxes. They belong to Michi and Yoshirin, who have just moved to their street.

setNode.title: Shin Chan Episode 10
setNode.description:
Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 1) 
The Noharas win a trip to Hawaii in a lottery at a department store.

Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 2) 
The Noharas fly with Michi and Yoshirin, and give the security guards and flight attendants a hard time.

Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 3) 
While Hiroshi, Misae and Himawari enjoy themselves at the beach, Shin chan finds the mermaid he was looking for.

setNode.title: Shin Chan Episode 13
setNode.description:
Hey, We’re the Three Little Pigs! 1 
Shinnosuke, Kazama and Brave Pig are three brother pigs who are always fighting one another, and their mother sends them away on a trip so they can learn to live on their own.

Hey, We’re the Three Little Pigs! 2 
The three little pigs continue their trip, in search for the pearl their mother has asked them to bring her.

Going to a Piano Recital 
Shinnosuke goes with Kazama to a piano recital, where Honoka, the girl Kazama likes, will be playing.

setNode.title: The Adventure
setNode.description: From Viridian Forest to Terminus Cave, see the Pokémon world as you’ve never seen it before!

setNode.title: The Chase
setNode.description: Detective Looker of the International Police uncovers critical information in the hunt for Team Rocket Boss Giovanni.

setNode.title: The Challenger
setNode.description: A new challenger approaches to test his abilities against the Kanto region’s Elite Four. Will he prove himself worthy?

setNode.title: The Lake of Rage
setNode.description: With rumors of a Red Gyarados rampaging in the Lake of Rage, Lance of the Elite Four decides to investigate.

setNode.title: The Legacy
setNode.description: In the wake of Team Rocket’s takeover of the Goldenrod Radio Tower, Detective Looker’s investigation leads him to an enigmatic young Trainer.

setNode.title: The Reawakening
setNode.description: The mysterious traveler Eusine explores the legends of Ecruteak City’s Burned Tower and the Pokémon who rose from its ashes.

setNode.title: The Vision
setNode.description: When an uninvited guest breaks into their headquarters, Team Magma must race against time to make their ambitions a reality.

setNode.title: The Cavern
setNode.description: Deep under the sea, Team Aqua’s leader is about to achieve his greatest goal. Can one voice of reason turn the tide of destruction?

setNode.title: The Scoop
setNode.description: While the Hoenn region rejoices after avoiding meteoric destruction, reporter Gabby and her cameraman Ty uncover the story of a lifetime.

setNode.title: The New World
setNode.description: With the beginnings of a new universe laid out before him, Cyrus of Team Galactic faces extreme opposition. But aid arrives in an unusual form.

setNode.title: The Magma Stone
setNode.description: The remnants of Team Galactic have awakened Heatran deep within Stark Mountain. Who can stop their burning ambitions from erupting into catastrophe?

setNode.title: The Old Chateau
setNode.description: Late at night, a young traveler and her Chansey lose their way in Eterna Forest. They soon stumble upon a house—but what waits inside?

setNode.title: The Uprising
setNode.description: With the ascension of their king and the fall of the Pokémon League, Team Plasma is poised to take control—until the Gym Leaders arrive!

setNode.title: The Frozen World
setNode.description: Gym Leader Drayden prepares to defend Opelucid City against Team Plasma, but the true nature of their plans will chill him to his very core.

setNode.title: The King Returns
setNode.description: His plans left in ruins, Ghetsis makes one last attempt to bring Unova under his icy grasp. A hero arrives, intending to stop him...

setNode.title: The Beauty Eternal
setNode.description: Scientist. Entrepreneur. Visionary. Take a closer look at the man whose acts have redefined the Kalos region: Lysandre.

setNode.title: The Investigation
setNode.description: Detective Looker’s assistants Emma and Mimi have been helping him out in Lumiose City, until a crime wave threatens to tear them apart.

setNode.title: The Redemption
setNode.description: A new champion rises. An ancient king returns. A sorrow that has lasted 3,000 years is brought to an end.

setNode.title: Super Special Sonic Search & Smash Squad
Close Encounter of the Sonic Kind
The Mystery of the Missing Hi-tops
Pallet Party Panic
setNode.description: Ash and friends return to Pallet Town for a hero's welcome, only to be sent on another journey right away! Professor Oak is seeking a mysterious-looking Poké Ball, and he asks Ash, Brock, and Misty to find it for him.

setNode.title: A Scare in the Air
setNode.description: Our heroes prepare for their long journey to Valencia Island to bring back a mysterious Poké Ball for Professor Oak. When Ash wins a free blimp ride, it seems their travel woes are no more—but who's flying this thing?

setNode.title: Pokéball Peril
setNode.description: After making a crash landing onto Valencia Island, our heroes get directions to Professor Ivy’s laboratory, where the mysterious Poké Ball is being held. Brock is delighted to discover that the professor and her colleagues are fellow Pokémon breeders!

setNode.title: The Lost Lapras
setNode.description: Thanks to Jigglypuff's sleep-inducing song, the blimp carrying Ash and Misty back home goes off course and crashes on an island, where they meet a new friend named Tracey while trying to help a lost Lapras.

setNode.title: Fit to Be Tide
setNode.description: Ash, Misty, and Tracey set out to explore the Orange Islands, and Ash is determined to qualify for the Orange League! He soon learns that the Orange Crew challenges are a little different from the usual Gym battles.

setNode.title: Pikachu Re-Volts
setNode.description: When Ash, Misty, and Tracey arrive on Mandarin Island, Pikachu and Togepi turn against them and join a group of other angry Pokémon. When the misbehaving Pokémon disappear, Officer Jenny informs them that dozens of Pokémon have been reported missing!

setNode.title: The Crystal Onix
setNode.description: Ash finds a message in a bottle, which leads our heroes to a new adventure on Sunburst Island and a search for a very special Onix!

setNode.title: In the Pink
setNode.description: Our heroes find themselves on Pinkan Island, home to a large number of strangely colored Pokémon. Ash and Tracey are fascinated by these pink Pokémon…and so are the Team Rocket trio!

setNode.title: Shell Shock!
setNode.description: After joining a scientific expedition to investigate a Kabuto fossil, Ash and friends soon find themselves facing a series of natural disasters!

setNode.title: Bye, Bye Psyduck
setNode.description: Another Water-type specialist challenges Misty to a battle and offers some advice: she thinks Misty's Psyduck might be ready to evolve!

setNode.title: The Joy of Pokémon
setNode.description: Our heroes meet a very busy Nurse Joy who has to do some serious island-hopping to take care of all the Pokémon in the area! Can they help protect her from Team Rocket?

setNode.title: Navel Maneuvers
setNode.description: In Ash's second challenge against the Orange Crew, he must climb a mountain, build a bobsled, and win a sled race! Do his Pokémon have what it takes to help him through these obstacles?

setNode.title: Snack Attack
setNode.description: Our heroes' explorations take them to the seven Grapefruit Islands, where they learn that the islands' famous fruit has been disappearing! Ash, Misty, and Tracey set out to catch whoever's responsible.

setNode.title: A Shipful of Shivers
setNode.description: When divers recover an ancient Orange League Championship trophy, our heroes head straight for the art museum where it's on display to check it out! Unfortunately, Team Rocket has beaten them to the punch…

setNode.title: Meowth Rules!
setNode.description: When Team Rocket crashes on an island, Meowth is the center of attention when the locals mistake him for the  Great Meowth of Bounty,  a powerful creature spoken of in prophecy. What will happen when they learn the truth?

setNode.title: Tracey Gets Bugged
setNode.description: Misty is not pleased when our heroes land on an island swarming with Bug-type Pokémon, though Ash and Tracey are having a blast. When they find an injured Scyther, can Misty overcome her disgust and help out?

setNode.title: A Way Off Day Off
setNode.description: When Ash and friends find a wonderful island brimming with many kinds of fruit trees, they decide to take a break and enjoy the bounty! Of course, Team Rocket has other ideas…

setNode.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Pokémon?
setNode.description: Our heroes meet a couple of Trainers who don't seem to get along at all, even though their Nidoran are obviously smitten with each other. Misty is determined to solve this romantic challenge!

setNode.title: Git Along, Little Pokémon
setNode.description: Slogging through a thunderstorm, our heroes notice a group of Magnemite soaking up electricity from the lightning bolts. When they finally get into town to rest, there's a blackout! Can the Magnemite help?

setNode.title: The Mystery Menace
setNode.description: In Trovitopolis City, Ash and friends hear stories about some kind of monster that's been scaring everyone—and when the ground cracks open and dumps them in the sewer, it seems they might meet this monster face to face!

setNode.title: Misty Meets Her Match
setNode.description: After Misty dives into a whirlpool to rescue a girl, she learns that the girl's brother, Rudy, has a giant crush on her. Things get more complicated when it turns out he's also the Gym Leader Ash must challenge next!

setNode.title: Bound for Trouble
setNode.description: Ash and friends go in search of super-sized Pokémon, but when they fall for a Team Rocket trick, and then Pikachu and Meowth get snatched up by a giant Pidgeot, everyone must work together to get them back!

setNode.title: Charizard Chills
setNode.description: After hearing about Ash from the Trovita Island Gym Leader, another Trainer seeks him out for a battle...and after Pikachu is knocked out, Ash turns to his Charizard. But can he get the unruly Pokémon to listen to him?

setNode.title: The Pokémon Water War
setNode.description: Our heroes’ plans are interrupted by a raging fire in a nearby warehouse. When they try to fight the flames, they quickly find themselves in need of the local fire department: Team Wartortle!

setNode.title: Pokémon Food Fight
setNode.description: When Snorlax's Poké Ball breaks, Ash has a huge problem on his hands: How can our heroes get the slumbering Snorlax over a mountain pass to the nearest Pokémon Center?

setNode.title: Pokémon Double Trouble
setNode.description: Ash is anxious to win the final badge of the Orange League, and soon gets a taste of this Gym Leader’s strength as she helps him fend off another Team Rocket sneak attack!

setNode.title: The Wacky Watcher
setNode.description: Discovering a scientist’s submarine at sea, our heroes are soon surrounded by his life’s research: a school of splashing Magikarp! They want to help him study Magikarp Evolution, but Team Rocket has other ideas…

setNode.title: The Stun Spore Detour
setNode.description: With Ash and Tracey paralyzed by a wild Vileplume’s Stun Spore, it’s up to Misty to find a local plant and save the day!

setNode.title: Hello Pummelo
setNode.description: With his four Orange League badges in hand, Ash has one last challenge to face before he can be crowned Champion of the Orange League. Does he have what it takes?

setNode.title: Enter The Dragonite
setNode.description: Ash’s battle for the Orange League Winner’s Trophy rages on, and it soon becomes apparent that he will have to take on a powerful Dragonite to become the Orange League Champion!

setNode.title: Viva Las Lapras
setNode.description: Trying to rescue a local school of Lapras from would-be poachers, our heroes must find a way to convince these distrustful Pokémon they are friends...before it’s too late!

setNode.title: The Underground Round Up
setNode.description: With Pallet Town on their minds, our heroes are searching for a ferry, but soon discover the port is abandoned...except for some explosive Electrode! Can Ash stop Team Rocket before the ferry goes up in smoke?

setNode.title: The Tent Situation
setNode.description: Ash has an eventful homecoming with a surprise visit from an old friend, a visit to see Professor Oak, and a Team Rocket raid. There’s no place like home!

setNode.title: A Rivalry Rivival
setNode.description: After Gary comes to the rescue against Team Rocket, Ash seizes an opportunity…at long last, our hero gets to challenge his rival to their very first Pokémon battle!

eshopLinks.label: Pokémon OmegaPokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo

setNode.title: Princess vs. Princess
setNode.description: Misty and Jessie compete to be Queen of the Princess Festival! Ash and Brock lend Misty their Pokémon for the battle, and Jessie takes a licking despite a surprise Pokémon of her own.

setNode.title: The Purr-fect Hero
setNode.description: It’s Kids Day, and Ash and friends help some schoolchildren celebrate. Team Rocket spoils the fun by grabbing a kid instead of Pikachu. In a shocking turn of events, Meowth becomes a good guy...or does he?

setNode.title: Riddle Me This
setNode.description: Our heroes travel to Cinnabar Island, where Ash hopes to win the Volcano Badge. A strange character offers riddles about how to find the Gym, where Ash and Pikachu have a fiery battle with a Pokémon they’ve never seen before!

setNode.title: Volcanic Panic
setNode.description: Ash has finally located the Gym, suspended above a pool of molten lava! Only a strong Fire-type Pokémon could help him in this battle for the Volcano Badge, so Ash must rely on his misbehaving Charizard.

setNode.title: Beach Blank-out Blastoise
setNode.description: As Ash and the gang are rushing to catch the last ferry off of Cinnabar Island, they get sidetracked by a group of Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise who need their help!

setNode.title: The Misty Mermaid
setNode.description: Misty's Horsea is in desperate need of exercise, so the gang decides to take it to her sisters' Gym in Cerulean City. There, she learns that her sisters are planning an exciting underwater ballet.

setNode.title: Clefairy Tales
setNode.description: Ash, Brock, and Misty get sidetracked on their way to Viridian City when all of their belongings mysteriously disappear. While searching for their missing things, they find themselves mixed up in a close encounter that’s really out of this world!

setNode.title: The Battle of the Badge
setNode.description: Our heroes make their way to Viridian City, where Ash hopes to earn the Earth Badge. They get to the Gym just in time to see his rival, Gary, being defeated by an unknown Pokémon—and Gary insists that it's evil!

setNode.title: It’s Mr. Mime Time
setNode.description: On their way back to Pallet Town, our heroes encounter a runaway Mr. Mime. Ash disguises himself as another Mr. Mime so he can get close. When Team Rocket strikes, will they catch the right Mr. Mime?

setNode.title: Snow Way Out!
setNode.description: Our heroes find themselves at a fork in the road and decide to climb a steep and dangerous mountain. Pikachu gets lost, and they must all work together to find it, stay warm, and weather a storm.

setNode.title: Showdown at the Po-ké Corral
setNode.description: On a visit to Professor Oak’s house, Ash runs into Gary, and they talk about the upcoming Pokémon League. Professor Oak says they should learn from each other rather than competing, and that teamwork pays off when Team Rocket attacks!

setNode.title: The Evolution Solution
setNode.description: Ash joins his mom for a vacation on Seafoam Island. While there, he seeks out the programmer of the Pokédex to learn about the unusual Evolution of Slowpoke. This mystery is surprisingly revealed by Team Rocket's bumbling!

setNode.title: The Pi-Kahuna
setNode.description: When Ash wipes out during a surfing attempt, Victor rescues him and tells him about Humungadunga, a giant wave that sweeps through every 20 years. Can Ash and Pikachu give Victor the confidence he needs to catch the giant wave?

setNode.title: Make Room for Gloom!
setNode.description: Back in Pallet Town, Ash and friends meet Florinda, who works at the local nursery. Her Gloom won't evolve, so she’s afraid she's not training it properly. When Team Rocket attacks, everyone sees just how strong a Pokémon can become!

setNode.title: Lights, Camera, Quack-tion!
setNode.description: A famous director comes to town, and everybody wants to be the star! Since he only wants Pokémon in his movie, Ash, Brock, Misty, and Team Rocket fight hard to make sure it’s their Pokémon that will star opposite Wigglytuff.

setNode.title: Go West Young Meowth
setNode.description: When the gang attends the premiere of “Pokémon in Love,” Meowth looks back on his painful past. He shares the story of his life before Team Rocket, including how he learned to walk and talk like a human.

setNode.title: To Master the Onixpected
setNode.description: With only three weeks left before the Pokémon League competition, Ash, Brock, and Misty head up to Mt. Hideaway to find one of the Elite Four. They're after Pokémon training tips, but they discover a land of overgrown Onix instead!

setNode.title: The Ancient Puzzle of Pokémopolis
setNode.description: While Ash and Brock train for the Pokémon League, they uncover a hidden temple containing Pokémon fossils. Misty remembers a hidden city where people built temples to honor Pokémon. Could they have stumbled upon the ancient city of Pokémopolis?

setNode.title: Bad to the Bone
setNode.description: Our heroes are headed to the Pokémon League tournament at the Indigo Plateau when they meet another Trainer going their way. Unfortunately, all of his Gym badges have been stolen, so he can't compete...unless he takes Ash's badges instead!

setNode.title: All Fired Up!
setNode.description: The Pokémon League is about to begin with the ceremonial lighting of the torch, which carries a flame from the Legendary Pokémon Moltres. Of course, Team Rocket tries to steal it!

setNode.title: Round One—Begin!
setNode.description: It's the first day of the Pokémon League, and when Ash's friends learn his first battle will be held on the Water Field, they're full of advice!

setNode.title: Fire and Ice
setNode.description: As the Pokémon League continues, Ash battles on the Rock Field and has a run-in with Team Rocket after they set up a fake Pokémon Center to lure unwary Trainers!

setNode.title: The Fourth Round Rumble
setNode.description: Ash faces his toughest opponent yet on the Grass Field at the Pokémon League! Are he and his Bulbasaur ready to take on his opponent and her powerful Scyther?

setNode.title: A Friend in Deed
setNode.description: When Ash meets a like-minded Trainer named Richie at the Pokémon League, the two boys quickly become close friends—and so do their two Pikachu!

setNode.title: Friend and Foe Alike
setNode.description: In the fifth round of the Pokémon League, Ash and Richie are matched up against each other! Can their friendship withstand this important battle?

setNode.title: Friends to the End
setNode.description: Ash, Misty, and Brock are in the stands cheering for Richie as the Pokémon League winds down, and then they march together in the closing ceremonies. It's an experience that will stick with Ash throughout his journey as a Trainer!

eshopLinks.label: Pokémon OmegaPokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo

setNode.title: NATIONAL TEAM REUNION!
setNode.description: After playing on a Space level, it´s time to play the World: a new tournament will gather the best players from the best teams in the world. In order to reach there, they will need to build a great National Team. But, who will be the chosen players?

setNode.title: INAZUMA NATIONAL IS BORN!
setNode.description: The National team will be born from the game being played by the best players in the country. Sparks fly in this clash, nobody want to be left behind. But after the game, it will be the time for surprises when they know both the team and their new coach.

setNode.title: THE CURSED COACH
setNode.description: Inazuma National´s players are bewildered with Percival Travis, the new coach. To start with he didn´t look looks impressed with his players, as he says they have no level to play the world. And in the second hand, there are very strange rumours about him...

setNode.title: THE CURTAIN IS LIFTED! WORLD´S CHALLENGE!
setNode.description: If Inazuma National want to play at the Football Frontier International, they should win the regional qualifiers. Their first rival are Big Waves, Australia National Team, a team which plays as easy as a fish swims... but our heroes can not leave their rooms' fish tanks until the day of the game.

setNode.title: LET´S OVERCOME THE BIG WAVE!
setNode.description: First world challenge is as tough as they have expected to be. Strong Australian defence prevent Japan players to move freely; but they have been practising for days against this kind of game. Besides, if there are Big Waves, Inazuma  has its own footballer-surfer.

setNode.title: DESERT LIONS! SOME ARDENT FIGHTERS!
setNode.description: After Australia, next rivals are here: players used to run and with a lot of stamina. Inazuma  should reinforce those features within the team. Or they should, as soon as they discover why one of them is always leaving training early.

setNode.title: AUSTIN´S AWAKING HOUR!
setNode.description: Qatar´s Desert Lions is putting Inazuma  on a spot. Their stamina and physical game-play is wearing them out little by little. Travis Coach´s answer is clear: Austin should dare to give the final step. Team´s fate depends on him.

setNode.title: WHAT A CLASH: MARK VS. ARCHER!
setNode.description: Archer Hawkins is the strangest of all the members of Inazuma ´s team. It looks like as if he had never play football, and still, he´s in the team all right. Mark will insist on getting close to him, but he will need the help of former Raimon´s coach in order to know all about him...

setNode.title: TEAM CHANGE? THE BIGGEST CHALLLENGE!
setNode.description: Inazuma  players have the unexpected visit of Lina Schiller, former Raimon Eleven´s coach. She is not coming alone, but with Neo, a team made from former rivals who didn´t reach the  team. Their goal? Quite simple: replace our friends at Football Frontier Inter!

setNode.title: ULTIMATE CHALLENGE! PERCY TRAVIS´ JAPAN AGAINST LINA SCHILLER´S!
setNode.description: Neo  Team are set to take Inazuma  place, and its players´ spirit put Inazuma ´s in a predicament. Apart from that, they also master Super-Techniques which caused a lot of problems in the past, but improved even increased to a degree never seen before.

setNode.title: CAMMY´S PLAN FOR A NEW SUPER-TECHNIQUE!
setNode.description: Mark is worried because he needs a new Super-Technique and he cannot come into anything. Cammy is worried over Mark´s concern. And Sue will exploit both worries to made up a story that it will lead to the strangest date in history…

setNode.title: AXEL´S DECISION
setNode.description: Asian qualifiers´ final is getting near, the whole team is getting ready for this final challenge and new Super-Techniques are being developed to fight their rivals. But Axel Blaze realizes that maybe he will not follow his friends and team mates.

setNode.title: THE LAST MATCH
setNode.description: After his father refusal, Axel agrees to drop football as soon as qualifiers are over. But his deal will affect the team´s condition, specially Mark´s, who is already shocked after getting a strange letter, apparently from some unexpected sender.

setNode.title: ASIA STRONGEST: FIRE DRAGONS!
setNode.description: Finals against Korea seemed a very special game at first glance, and now it´s quite more since Inazuma  players finds some old acquaintances in Korean ranks. But no matter how dangerous they might be, the biggest threat from Korea it is his captain, the Dragon Tamer.

setNode.title: AN UNBEATABLE STRATEGY: PERFECT ZONE PRESS!!
setNode.description: Inazuma is leading the score, but then their rivals start Perfect Zone Press, the strategy which gave them so many victories. And things start getting worse little by little for our friends. And the very spirit of the team is still in the bench…

setNode.title: RISE, CAPTAIN!
setNode.description: It´s time to took measures to help Inazuma  out of the tight spot they are. While Mark Evans try and think how to do that, Caleb Stonewall. Inazuma´s most controversial player enters into the field. How will the team answer to him?

setNode.title: LET´S TAKE THE TICKET FOR THE FINALS!
setNode.description: Teams´ revolution might work, but before that, some players need to be released from the fear and distrust that held them down. If Inazuma  wants to be in the FFI, the team as a whole should give everything they have to beat Fire Dragons!

setNode.title: HERE IS THE WORLD TOURNAMENT!
setNode.description: Once they got their pass for Football Frontier Inter, the team flies to Liocott, the island where the competition will take place. There they will meet people they haven´t see since a long time ago, possible future rivals... even Mark will know something that might change everything he believed until then.

setNode.title: WHAT A SHOCK! THIS IS PLAYING AT WORLD LEVEL!
setNode.description: The teams taking part have been divided into two groups, and Inazuma  already know who their opponents are. Before starting the real matches, Mark will have a first chance to know who they will fight against and tasting what means playing at world level, the highest of all.

setNode.title: KNIGHTS OF QUEEN, ENGLAND´S KNIGHTS!
setNode.description: Knights of Queen will be Inazuma ´s first opponent. The game will not be not easy at all, since the English knights have quite more football experience and tradition. Apart from that, they know that the hopes of millions are with them. How will our heroes answer to the pressure?

setNode.title: AT LAST FINISHED! MY OWN TECHNIQUE!
setNode.description: The match is as tough as it seemed from the very beginning: Knights of Queen´s techniques are hurting Inazuma  bad. Specially when Mark cannot stop their shots with his old techniques. Maybe it´s time to forget everything he knows and try something absolutely new.

setNode.title: LET´S GO BEYOND MUGEN THE HAND!
setNode.description: Tournament does not give a chance to breathe. As soon a game is over, they have to start training for the next. Now that Mark did surpass his old Super-Techniques, Darren thinks he is getting behind, so he have to do the same as Mark, with the help of his team mates.

setNode.title: ROYAL´S CURSE! FIRST PART
setNode.description: While Darren keeps on looking for a Super-Technique of his own, other Inazuma ´s player think they have seen Ray Dark. Jude and David run after him, fearing he might be planning another scheme of his to end against the team. When will be they free from this man´s shadow?

setNode.title: ROYAL´S CURSE! SECOND PART
setNode.description: At the same time that Jude and the others look for Ray Dark, Italy´s  team find they have a new coach, and that he decide to change their team for his. Original players decided not to leave the tournament, so they challenge the new coach... and accidents start. What´s hiding this man called Mister D?

setNode.title: AWESOME! THERE ARE TWO JUDES!
setNode.description: Our friends set to help Italian players against the new coach´s ´Team D´. But when they enter into the field, they are surprised to see that Mister D´s team has a ´Jude´ of their own; even his super-techniques are similar.

setNode.title: THE BIGGEST CLASH! PENGUIN VS. PENGUIN!
setNode.description: In this match, three big showdowns are having place: Orpheus vs. Team D, Jude vs. Giulio -his copycat- and former Royal Academy´s players vs. Ray Dark´s threat. To achieve victory, they should win every one of them. But... what will be the price?

setNode.title: THE IMPREGNABLE FORTRESS!
setNode.description: Just when everything seemed solved, our heroes find that the Argentine match has been put forward. Now Inazuma  is about to face a tough game against a team famous for its defence while missing four of their key players, and their coach.

setNode.title: DESPERATE SITUATION! INAZUMA NATIONAL´S DEFEAT?
setNode.description: The game cannot get worse for Inazuma : not only they miss several key players but their rivals´ defence gives them not chance to score. If they really want to win, they should show that the team´s spirit lies within every one of them, not just Mark.

setNode.title: CAMMY´S SECRET
setNode.description: The match against The Empire brings some changes to the team and the players. Now that they have some rest before the next game, it´s time to have a little break, or watch how their other rivals are doing. Just then Mark is about to learn what´s after Cammy Travis.

setNode.title: ERIK´S LAST KICK-OFF!
setNode.description: Next team to play against Inazuma  is Unicorn, the team from the US., where their former team mates Erik and Bobby play. The game should be exciting... if those two were not acting so strange. What they could be hiding from their old pals?

setNode.title: FULL-THROTTLE FRIENDSHIP! ERIK VS. MARK!
setNode.description: Erik is playing like never before against his former team mates, even if it is for a reason he doesn´t want to tell anyone. When Mark finally learns what´s happening, he decides to answer Erik´s courage with his own. The best gift to someone who´s is playing at his fullest is playing at your fullest, too!

setNode.title: PHOENIX´S RESOLUTION
setNode.description: The match between Inazuma  and Unicorn is near its end. Unicorn´s Special tactic seems unbeatable, but nor Mark neither Inazuma  thinks about giving up. And when the game ends, the best reward will be know that they will meet again.

setNode.title: MEETING WITH KAPPAS, WHAT A SHOCK!
setNode.description: Fairytales talk little imps called ´Kappas´ who live by the ponds. Mark says he did see one, but nobody believed him. When Xavier and Scotty meet two very strange boys in the middle of the forest, maybe they should have paid more attention to their captain´s words...

setNode.title: WHAT A CRASH! TIGER AND HAWK!
setNode.description: It´s always tough being far from home, even if your friends are by your side. Some people get eased with home letters, some other it´s just the opposite. Now that Austin start to behave strangely, maybe Archer, the other rookie in the team, is the only one who can really understand and help him to overcome it.

setNode.title: RECOVERED MEMORIES! THE THRUTH ABOUT CAMMY!
setNode.description: Now that the team is training at full force, getting ready for the last game of the first stage, tension affects Cammy. Little by little, her memories start breaking the barriers within her mind. Can her friends help her to cope with the secret of her life?

setNode.title: JUST ONE STEP FROM THE FINAL STAGE! PAOLO´S RESOLUTION!
setNode.description: The match against Orpheus will be decisive to reach FFI´s final stage. Nobody doubt about the quality of Paolo and the rest of the Italian players, but the biggest mystery is Orpheus´s coach, Mister D. They find quite difficult to trust him knowing who he is and what he has done.

setNode.title: CATENACCHIO COUNTER!, THE MOST POWERFUL SPECIAL TACTIC!
setNode.description: Biggest showdown in the Orpheus – Inazuma ´s game is not about the teams, but about how to answer to Ray Dark´s presence. While some distrust and fear him, others seen what was after his works and they are ready to believe in him. Italian team´s reaction against Mark and the others depends on this.

setNode.title: EXPLOSIVE SHOWDOWN! PAOLO VS. MARK
setNode.description: The showdown between Inazuma  and Orpheus is an exciting one, since Paolo Bianchi and the rest of Italian players rallied around Mister D. Catenacchio Counter, their new special tactic, seems unbeatable, specially since real Orpheus´ captain joins the game. He brings not only his game play, but several answers, and some questions for Mister D, too.

setNode.title: RAY DARK´S LAST CHALLENGE
setNode.description: Orpheus´ captain arrival gave new strength to Mark´s rivals, putting our heroes in a tight spot. But in this game there are more things at stake than reaching the final stage. The most important of them if Ray Dark, a.k.a. ´Mister D´ will release from the darkness he lived in and make it up with his past.

setNode.title: GRANPA´S LAST NOTEBOOK
setNode.description: Last game´s results made Inazuma  players to follow closely their groups´ last games. It is not strange that the arrival of David Evans´ last notebook went almost unnoticed to them. In this, instead of hints for a super-technique there are “hints for the heart”. Also, nobody noticed that Inazuma ´s biggest fans arrived to Liocott Island, too.

setNode.title: THE LEGEND OF LIOCOTT!
setNode.description: Legend says that long time ago, dwellers from the skies and the depths fought in Liocott Island in awesome football games. And the legend says they are about to come back. Of course, it´s nothing but a tale for kids, but when the sky suddenly darken while training and some mysterious people faces our heroes, maybe they were not tales after all...

setNode.title: APOSTLES FROM THE SKY!
setNode.description: Heaven´s Garden & Demon´s Gate dwellers took Sue and Celia away to fulfil their prophecies. Of course, our friends are not willing to let them having their way, so they part to rescue the girls. Mark´s team will go up to take Sue back, which means playing against Heaven´s Garden players and their captain, Sanctus.

setNode.title: DEVIL ARMY Z!
setNode.description: Jude and his team descend through the mountain to rescue his sister. But, as in the previous Episode, the only way to do it is through a football game. Between flames and heat it will took place a football game where players from all the countries play against the dwellers of Demon´s gate to save Celia... will they make it?

setNode.title: DARK ANGEL, THE DEMON KING ARRIVES!
setNode.description: Danger seemed to be over, but actually it was quite the opposite. The teams our heroes played against are now fused into one, and that might have terrible consequences. Mark and his friends should make people from the skies and the depths to understand what´s the real meaning of football.

setNode.title: THE KINGDOM´S DARKNESS!
setNode.description: When the adventure is over, FFI comes back with the semifinal between Inazuma  and The Kingdom. They look one of the strongest teams in the world, but then why Mac Robingo -The Kingdom´s captain- ask Mark such an unbelievable favour? When Mark and friends do some research, they discover there are many strange things about The Kingdom and their powerful coach.

setNode.title: ZOOLAN RICE´S CONSPIRATION
setNode.description: The Kingdom´s coach is a very powerful man, both inside and outside the football world. His shadow seems to reach every corner and it´s turning his team´s beautiful game into something else. Our heroes now face a hideous dilemma: letting Rice have his way or playing at their best to set Robingo and his team mates free from their own coach´s menace.

setNode.title: INAZUMA NATIONAL VS. THE KINGDOM
setNode.description: Mac Robingo decided to summit himself to Rice´s program to protect his friends, even if the price to pay may be too high. Even if his team mates are not willing to accept his sacrifice, what can they do? And, what can Inazuma  do to stop it? Help may be on its way, though...

setNode.title: THE COUNTER-ATTACK OF THE KINGS OF FOOTBALL!
setNode.description: Zoolan Rice is already out from The Kingdom; Mac Robingo and his friends are free to play as they really know. The challenge for Mark, Thor and everyone suddenly grow. They should use every super-technique they know to reach that spot in Football Frontier Inter´s Final game. There is someone waiting for them there.

setNode.title: LITTLE GIANTS´ MARVEL!
setNode.description: After Inazuma ´s Semifinals´ game it´s the time to Paolo´s team to play theirs. Orpheus seems the favourite, but their rivals overwhelm them. Now Inazuma  should discover who those Little Giants really are or why Nelly Raimon is helping them. Maybe the answer lies in their unusual coach. At least, Mark thinks he knows him from anywhere else...

setNode.title: THE ATTACK OF THE ULTIMATE REINFORCED HUMANS!
setNode.description: Zoolan Rice is back again! But now his anger is address against Little Giants and their coach. So he gathered a group of very special players to trash them all. But it is Mark and the rest of Inazuma  who will come in Rice´s way once more. Will they be enough to stop this reinforced team?

setNode.title: THE FRIGHTFUL ZOOLAN TEAM!
setNode.description: Rices´ reinforced humans´ team is causing serious problems to Inazuma . When Mark old super-techniques seems to no avail, he should find a new one, and he will have an unexpected help for it.

setNode.title: THE STRONGEST RIVAL!
setNode.description: After so many years of separation, Mark and his grandfather can talk at last. It´s quite more than a mere reunion between grandchild and grandparent, but it also means knowing the coach and the main player of the team he will play against in the Finals. And Mark is about to know they are awesome opponents.

setNode.title: SPECIAL FRIENDLY TRAINING WITH PAOLO!
setNode.description: Inazuma  should train more and better than never if they wan to be ready for the finals. But a training is not the same than a real game, so that´s what Paolo and Orpheus are for. They will play Little Giant´s role and if Mark and friend can surpass them.... the road to the victory might be a little more clear!

setNode.title: ELEVEN MOTTOES TO WIN THE WORLD!
setNode.description: Once solved the physical question, it´s time for mind preparation: Inazuma  must be as sure of their victory as their rivals are!
