And once more, Mark and his friends will find the answers in a notebook written by David Evans a long time ago. There are eleven mottoes for the team´s eleven players.

setNode.title: INAZUMA NATIONAL´S FINAL SHOWDOWN!
setNode.description: The day has arrived! Football Frontier Inter Finals started! Both team will play their trump cards, including some unexpected ones. Despite all their preparation, maybe the game will not develop as Mark and friends were waiting for!

setNode.title: FINAL DUEL AT THE SUMMIT: LITTLE GIANTS! FIRST PART
setNode.description: The Finals it is at its peak, but now is Mark who is having a hard time, unless he develop his ultimate super-technique. Now that the whole team rally around their captain, we will know the real nature of both teams, Inazuma  and Little Giants.

setNode.title: FINAL DUEL AT THE SUMMIT: LITTLE GIANTS! SECOND PART
setNode.description: If our friends of Inazuma  thought the Finals was already over, how wrong they were. David Evans & Hector Helios still keep an ace in their sleeves which will put Mark & friends in a very tight spot! How will Inazuma  answer to this challenge that seems to have no end?

setNode.title: THE END AT LAST! THE BEST IN THE WORLD!!
setNode.description: The game it is in its last minutes, the players´ forces are running down. It´s the moment when they should what Is at stake and what´s really important. Also, it´s now when Inazuma  coach give their team the most unusual command: ´Have fun!´

setNode.title: TEARS IN THE GRADUATION!
setNode.description: It´s been months since the Finals, and Mark Evans and his friends´ graduation ceremony arrived. Besides of giving one step front in their lives, they need to give one step aside to have Raimon football club to going on with other players. Nothing better for that than an old football game...

setNode.title: A KICK-OFF TOWARDS TOMORROW!
setNode.description: Nobody wanted to miss Mark and his friend´s last Hight School game. There are so many memories, so many experiences around the ball that is though having them end... But if there is something everybody knows is that no matter where Mark Evans or Raimon would be, there will be football and adventures for everyone!

setNode.title: Pokémon—I Choose You!
setNode.description: Ash Ketchum, a 10-year-old from Pallet Town, is finally old enough to receive his first Pokémon! However, he oversleeps, and the only remaining Pokémon at Professor Oak’s lab is a strong-willed Pikachu!

setNode.title: Pokémon Emergency
setNode.description: Ash rushes into Viridian City with his wounded Pikachu, where he encounters Jessie, James, and Meowth of Team Rocket, as well as Misty, who’s angry about Ash wrecking her bike!

setNode.title: Ash Catches a Pokémon
setNode.description: Ash discovers and catches his first Pokémon! Though he’s excited, Misty is grossed out by his new Bug-type Pokémon friend.

setNode.title: Challenge of the Samurai
setNode.description: An angry swarm of Beedrill attacks Ash and Samurai in the midst of a Metapod standoff! Ash flees, leaving behind his Metapod, who is mad at him for abandoning it.

setNode.title: Showdown in Pewter City
setNode.description: Ash challenges the Pewter City Gym Leader, Brock, but even Pikachu has no chance against Brock’s Rock-type Pokémon. With the mysterious Flint helping him, it’s time for Ash to train hard before the rematch!

setNode.title: Clefairy and the Moon Stone
setNode.description: A scientist named Seymour leads Ash and his friends deep into Mt. Moon to find the fabled Moon Stone, which is said to increase the power of Pokémon!

setNode.title: The Water Flowers of Cerulean City
setNode.description: Ash seeks the Cascade Badge in Cerulean City—but for some reason, Misty doesn’t want to join him.

setNode.title: The Path to the Pokémon League
setNode.description: After earning his second badge, Ash sets off triumphantly for Vermilion City. Along the way, he hears of AJ, a Trainer on the brink of 100 straight victories. Full of confidence, Ash challenges this fearsome Trainer!

setNode.title: The School of Hard Knocks
setNode.description: Ash meets some students from the Pokémon Technical Institute, who are bullying their classmate Joe. Joe insists the rough treatment is necessary so he’ll be strong enough to graduate. Ash doesn’t agree.

setNode.title: Bulbasaur and the Hidden Village
setNode.description: Completely lost, our heroes reach a village not shown on their map. This quiet place is inhabited by Pokémon that have been injured in battle or abandoned by their Trainers.

setNode.title: Charmander—the Stray Pokémon
setNode.description: As our heroes press on toward Vermilion City, they encounter an injured Charmander, sitting atop a stone on a mountain pass. They later find out why it is waiting there.

setNode.title: Here Comes the Squirtle Squad
setNode.description: Ash and his friends walk along a path and fall into a hole dug by a group of mischievous Squirtle. Why is the Squirtle Squad such a menace to the local population?

setNode.title: Mystery at the Lighthouse
setNode.description: The party meets Bill, a Pokémon researcher who is waiting in his lighthouse for the coming of a one-of-a-kind Pokémon, never before seen by humans. Could such a Pokémon truly exist?

setNode.title: Electric Shock Showdown
setNode.description: Eager to earn a badge, Ash challenges Lt. Surge. Pikachu reluctantly enters the battle, only to discover that its opponent is a Raichu, a fierce Pokémon with tremendous electric power—and the evolved form of Pikachu!

setNode.title: Battle Aboard the St. Anne
setNode.description: Ash and his friends board the cruise ship St. Anne, thanks to tickets provided by Jessie and James in disguise. Their latest plan is to lure Pokémon Trainers onto the ship and steal their Pokémon!

setNode.title: Pokémon Shipwreck
setNode.description: A powerful storm forces everyone except Team Rocket and our heroes to abandon the sinking St. Anne. Ash, Brock and Misty are forced to team up with their long-standing enemies in order to survive this sticky situation!

setNode.title: Island of the Giant Pokémon
setNode.description: As our heroes and Team Rocket beat the odds by surviving the sinking of the St. Anne, they are dragged into another perilous situation when they are attacked by the Atrocious Pokémon, Gyarados!

setNode.title: Tentacool & Tentacruel
setNode.description: When a group of Tentacool interferes with the construction of a hotel in Porta Vista, Nastina offers a reward to anyone who can repel them. However, our heroes are forced into action when Team Rocket’s ploy fails spectacularly!

setNode.title: The Ghost of Maiden’s Peak
setNode.description: Our heroes arrive at a small port town, in the middle of celebrating a summer festival. To recover from their hard journey, Ash and his friends decide to relax and enjoy the festivities.

setNode.title: Bye-Bye, Butterfree
setNode.description: When the party sees a group of Butterfree flying above the ocean, Ash decides to release his own Butterfree. After being rejected once, can Ash’s Butterfree win over the heart of its pink sweetheart?

setNode.title: Abra and the Psychic Showdown
setNode.description: The party finally arrives in Saffron City, where a young girl commands a Pokémon Gym with her psychic powers. If Ash defeats Gym Leader Sabrina, he will earn his fourth Gym badge—the Marsh Badge!

setNode.title: The Tower of Terror
setNode.description: After being defeated by Sabrina, Ash realizes that he must catch a Ghost-type Pokémon to defeat the Saffron Gym Leader’s awesome Psychic-type Pokémon. He heads for Pokémon Tower in Lavender Town, where they are said to dwell.

setNode.title: Haunter vs. Kadabra
setNode.description: Leaving Pokémon Tower with Haunter in tow, Ash returns to Saffron City with only one goal in mind: to win the Marsh Badge from the powerful Psychic-type Gym Leader, Sabrina!

setNode.title: Primeape Goes Bananas
setNode.description: When Ash tries to catch a wild Mankey, it loses its cool and uses Thrash on the whole gang—even stealing Ash’s hat! Will Ash find a way to pacify this pugnacious Pokémon?

setNode.title: Pokémon Scent-sation!
setNode.description: After insulting Gym Leader Erika’s perfume at a department store, Ash must go to some outrageous lengths to even set foot in the Celadon Gym, let alone be deemed worthy to challenge her!

setNode.title: Hypno’s Naptime
setNode.description: Officer Jenny reveals that a mysterious sleep wave has been detected in the area for several days. Our heroes suspect this has something to do with why so many children have gone missing, and why the Pokémon at the Pokémon Center aren’t getting better.

setNode.title: Pokémon Fashion Flash
setNode.description: At Brock’s persistent request, our heroes stop by Scissor Street, a place well-known to Pokémon breeders for its Pokémon beauty salons.

setNode.title: The Punchy Pokémon
setNode.description: Outside Fuchsia City, our heroes come across Hitmonchan, a Fighting-type Pokémon. With little thought, Ash attempts to battle it, but he and Pikachu are quickly defeated. But who is the mysterious Trainer of this extraordinary Hitmonchan?

setNode.title: Sparks Fly for Magnemite
setNode.description: When a blackout plunges Gringey City into darkness, Ash and friends go to investigate the nearby power plant, where they find Magnemite and a host of Grimer. Could they be responsible for the city’s power outage?

setNode.title: Dig Those Diglett!
setNode.description: Ash, Brock, Misty and Pikachu are lost deep in the mountains. As they press on through a rough track that doesn’t show up on their map, they suddenly hear a large explosion!

setNode.title: The Ninja Poké-Showdown
setNode.description: On his way to the next Gym Battle challenge but seemingly lost, Ash and friends arrive at a huge mansion that appears to be a hidden ninja’s lair! Could this be the Fuchsia Gym?

setNode.title: The Flame Pokémon-athon!
setNode.description: In the place of the injured Lara, can Ash handle her fiery Ponyta and guide it to victory in the annual race?

setNode.title: The Kangaskhan Kid
setNode.description: Our heroes accompany Officer Jenny into the forest, intent on pursuing some poachers. Soon, they discover a young boy amidst a pack of Kangaskhan. His name is Tommy, and no one knows the secret of his childhood…

setNode.title: The Bridge Bike Gang
setNode.description: After they encounter a very long bridge that can be only crossed by bike, a job delivering medicine is just the ticket for Ash and friends to reach Sunnytown!

setNode.title: Ditto’s Mysterious Mansion
setNode.description: Caught in a sudden rain shower, our heroes quickly try to seek some shelter. Dragging a very reluctant Misty, Ash and Brock go inside a cabin, and instantly get the impression that they are not alone!

setNode.title: Pikachu’s Goodbye
setNode.description: The gang discovers a large group of wild Pikachu, and though they first seem frightened by the intruder, the group eventually opens up to Ash’s Pikachu. How will Pikachu feel seeing others of its kind in the wild?

setNode.title: The Battling Eevee Brothers
setNode.description: Ash and friends find a huge home with a lavish garden party in full swing, attended by the Trainers of Pokémon that evolve using Evolution stones. Maybe they can find the seemingly abandoned Eevee’s Trainer here?

setNode.title: Wake Up, Snorlax!
setNode.description: Our hungry heroes arrive at a small village. In return for a meal, Ash, Misty, and Brock agree to investigate what is causing the river to dry up, destroying the village’s harvest.

setNode.title: Showdown at Dark City
setNode.description: We join our heroes on the outskirts of Dark City, which appears to be deserted. Even during the middle of the day, there is no one on the streets. What has happened to make this place so desolate?

setNode.title: The March of the Exeggutor Squad
setNode.description: Ash is hard at work, continuing his rigorous training schedule even over spring vacation—until our heroes discover there’s a traveling carnival nearby! Ash, Misty and Brock quickly join in the fun of the fair!

setNode.title: The Problem with Paras
setNode.description: Still in hot pursuit of our heroes, Team Rocket is ready to make yet another attempt to catch Pikachu—until disaster strikes! It soon becomes apparent that Meowth is getting sick!

setNode.title: The Song of Jigglypuff
setNode.description: Putting her idea of catching Jigglypuff aside for now, Misty promises to find a solution to this Pokémon’s singing situation!

setNode.title: Attack of the Prehistoric Pokémon
setNode.description: According to Ash’s rival Gary, fossils from extinct Pokémon have been discovered in the area, triggering a great fossil rush in the canyon. Ash decides to join in the excavation as a chance to beat Gary!

setNode.title: A Chansey Operation
setNode.description: Ash is sleeping peacefully until he is awoken by Brock and Misty with alarming news: there’s something wrong with Pikachu’s voice! Worried, Ash runs off with Pikachu in search of the nearest Pokémon Center.

setNode.title: Holy Matrimony!
setNode.description: As our heroes are walking in the countryside, they notice a “Missing Persons” poster of an undeniably familiar face: it looks exactly like James from Team Rocket! Is it really him in the poster?

setNode.title: So Near, Yet So Farfetch’d
setNode.description: Our heroes discuss the rumor that a rare wild Farfetch’d has been seen in the area. Ash and Misty both vow to catch it, and soon they get their chance when the Wild Duck Pokémon appears!

setNode.title: Who Gets to Keep Togepi?
setNode.description: On leaving the Pokémon Center, our heroes discuss what they think will hatch from the Pokémon Egg Ash discovered. Nearby, Team Rocket begins hatching another daring plan to make it theirs!

setNode.title: Bulbasaur’s Mysterious Garden
setNode.description: During a battle with another Trainer’s Rhyhorn, the bulb on Bulbasaur’s back begins to glow, prompting Ash to take it to the local Pokémon Center. They soon discover that Bulbasaur isn’t sick—it’s getting ready to evolve!

setNode.title: The Case of the K-9 Caper
setNode.description: On their way to Cinnabar Island, our heroes join Officer Jenny and the police force’s Growlithe in some special training, hoping to improve Pikachu’s battle skills.

setNode.title: Pokémon Paparazzi
setNode.description: On a brief stop for lunch, Ash and his friends meet Todd Snap, a Pokémon photographer who has been trying to get a perfect shot of Pikachu.

setNode.title: The Ultimate Test
setNode.description: Realizing that he hasn’t won any Gym badges for a while, Ash signs up for the Pokémon League Admissions Exam, a great chance to prove he’s got what it takes to become a Pokémon Master!

setNode.title: The Breeding Center Secret
setNode.description: Ash and the gang decide to check out a breeding center that they saw on a commercial. However, the center is a cover for a diabolical scheme from Team Rocket members Butch and Cassidy—old rivals of Jessie and James!

eshopLinks.label: Pokémon OmegaPokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo Ruby and Alpha Sapphire Special Demo

setNode.title: The Aliens Are Here!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Victory for the Raimon 11 proves to be very short lived, as only a few minutes after their win, the sky falls in. Literally! All of a sudden the earth is overrun by aliens! And they play football! What will Mark and the others do about this out-of-this-world development?

setNode.title: The Raimon 11 Fight Back!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The Raimon 11 have stepped up to try and save the world against the football players of Alius Academy, but it’s like pitting an ant against an elephant. Meanwhile - the president, and indeed the world itself, is in danger from that very same threat.

setNode.title: Take Down the Black 11!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The president has been kidnapped by aliens, and Mark and the others are determined to help him. The Inazuma Caravan travels to the park where he was kidnapped, ready to beat the aliens off. But wait - who are THESE people? And why are they so hostile?

setNode.title: The Alius Academy Threat
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The tenacious Raimon 11 players never give up, and they’re going to try again against Alius Academy. But try as they might, they can't even hold a candle to them. It doesn’t help that the new coach seems to be sabotaging their every play - what’s going on now?

setNode.title: The Search for the Legendary Striker!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The news that Axel is kicked off the team doesn’t go over well with most of the Raimon players, especially Kevin Dragonfly. He carries the grudge all the way to Hokkaido with the team, as they search for the mythical ace striker - Shawn Frost. How will he react when they meet?

setNode.title: The Prince of Snow Land!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon are excited and surprised when they finally meet Shawn Frost, but is he really as good as everyone says? There’s only one way to find out, and that’s to play a game against him. Look out Mark, there’s some icy cool shots coming your way!

setNode.title: Who IS the New Ace Striker?
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Shawn Frost is officially part of the Raimon 11, but there are still some teamwork kinks to iron out. But by showing his teammates a brand new way of practising, maybe Shawn can bring them to a new level and bring the team together!

setNode.title: The Alius Academy Attack!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon have toughened up though their snowboard training and are ready to face Alius Academy one more time. But do they have what it takes to beat them? And even if they do, what else do Alius Academy have in store? Surely not another team…

setNode.title: Epsilon Attacks!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Just when everyone thought the earth had been saved, Alius Academy attack once more, but this time with Team Epsilon. These guys really mean business, and they’re beating up on a new school - Cloister Divinity in Kyoto. Will Raimon be able to help them, or is it too late?

setNode.title: The Hidden Power!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

After the crushing defeat of Cloister Divinity, Raimon step up to fill the hole, with Scotty the substitute helping out on Celia’s urging. The results are strange and disheartening, but also encouraging in one way. They’re going to have to do a lot of hard work, though!

setNode.title: Royal Academy’s Comeback - Part 1!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Looks like Team Raimon have a new member, in the form of Sneaky Scotty. They’ll need all the help they can get, though, because Ray Dark is back on the scene, in an unfeasibly silly submarine-based football stadium. He’s managed to revive Royal Academy and turn two of Jude’s old teammates against him!

setNode.title: Royal Academy’s Comeback - Part 2!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon are smack in the middle of a game against Royal Academy Redux, and Ray Dark has convinced its players to use any and every means to win, even if it means the destruction of their minds and bodies. Can Raimon show them the error of their ways before it’s too late?

setNode.title: The Last Wyvern Blizzard!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The Inazuma Caravan finally comes home so the team can recharge their batteries and…train a whole lot more. They find out that everybody’s been training to help them, including some old enemies! But all is not well on the team; the tough training has proved to be too much for one member in particular.

setNode.title: Erik Eagle in Serious Trouble!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

No sooner do they arrive home than they’re back on the road again - this time they’re heading to Osaka, where it’s rumoured that Alius Academy have a base. The team don’t find any aliens there, but they do find a bunch of strange and powerful ladies - with a secret!

setNode.title: Dvalin’s Trap!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The team find that the Golden Glamour Girls’ secret training bunker under the amusement park is a great place to train, but where did it come from? No time for questions - everyone has to train train train, because Epsilon are almost here again!

setNode.title: Epsilon - The Toughest Battle Yet!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The big game against Epsilon is here, and Raimon come out with all guns blazing! Will that be enough to turn back the alien scourge? Meanwhile, Shawn Froste is having an identity crisis of epic proportions that threatens to tear him and the team apart!

setNode.title: Grandpa’s Secret Trick!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Unexpected news about the existence of another David Evans notebook sends the team scurrying off to Fukuoka, where they meet one of Mark’s grandfather’s old friends, and someone who might just become Mark’s apprentice. When the team sees what little Darren can do, they’re amazed!

setNode.title: The Other Majin the Hand!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The exhibition game between Raimon and Fauxshore Jr - AKA the battle of the goalies - is a knuckle-biting affair. Both Mark and Darren are showing off their old moves and trying to learn new ones while a storm of shots rages around them. Meanwhile they’re being watched - just who IS this Xavier boy?

setNode.title: Seismic Earthquake Shocker!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Just when Raimon were feeling confident, they get a wake up call in the form of a big slap in the face from Xavier and his Genesis team. Sure, part of being a winning team is being able to cope with loss, but a loss this big? Worst of all, it seems the team is losing more than just the game…

setNode.title: The Captain’s Test!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Disaster after disaster is hitting the Raimon team hard. First Nathan decides to quit, then another member decides he can't take it anymore. Mark is in crisis and can't deal with everything that’s happening. But if he can't deal with it, who can? The ball stops with him after all…

setNode.title: The Great Battle in the Southern Sea
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

On the way to Okinawa, the team are waylaid when Willy’s scientific curiosity gets the better of him. The meeting proves fruitful, though, as they encounter a surfer with a kick like a jet engine! Has he really never played football before? It’s a little hard to believe!

setNode.title: The Flame Striker
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon have arrived in Okinawa to begin their search for the Flame Striker. Most of the team are convinced it’s Axel, but they won't know until they see him. Hold on, who’s this guy? He’s got a kick like a mule, but there’s something fishy about him…

setNode.title: The Radical Rhythmic Football Game
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Mark and the boys successfully put the nightmare of Xavier behind them, and now it’s time to have some fun. But fun always means football and they’re off to a game with Mary Times High, who Hurley’s decided to play for. They think it’s going to be a walk in the park, but boy are they wrong!

setNode.title: The Fist of Justice!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon are in trouble against Mary Times and their amazing rhythmic style of play. They'd better find a way to mix up the timing before they’re drummed out of the game entirely! Luckily somebody’s on the ball, but will they be able to save the day?

setNode.title: Epsilon’s Counterattack!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Just when they thought it was safe to go back on the football field, Raimon are besieged by the aliens once more. It’s Epsilon again, but not as they know them. Their power has increased and they’re nastier than ever. Can Mark and the rest of the team rise to the occasion?

setNode.title: The Fire Revival!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Unsurprisingly, Epsilon Prime are wiping the floor with Raimon Jr, but their spirits can't be broken. If they all pull together and work hard and have fun, they can beat these aliens and save their earth...or can they?

setNode.title: The Freezing Darkness of Diamond Dust!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The team are ecstatic - they’ve got Axel back and they’re heading home for some R and R. All is not well with Shawn Froste, but with some care and attention he should be back to full strength soon. Hopefully very soon, because Diamond Dust show up looking for a fight much earlier than anybody wants...

setNode.title: Byron - The Back Up of the Gods
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Well, the team didn’t get their beef stew yet, because it’s straight back to the big game against Diamond Dust, the elite team of Alius Academy. Mark and the team have got stronger, but are they strong enough to beat the best of the best?

setNode.title: A New Challenge!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Mark’s been forced to quit his position as goalie, but the situation isn’t as bad as everyone feared - he’s just moving a little up the field and becoming a defender! But he’s going to need a whole different set of skills - will he be able to learn them in time for the big game?

setNode.title: Mark Vs Axel!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Mark and the rest of the team make a visit to Royal Academy. For some it brings back bad memories, but for others it’s an opportunity to learn new moves and new tactics. The team is going to need them, because the aliens are gathering again, and they have Raimon in their sights!

setNode.title: The Miraculous Team!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Raimon have been practising and hoping for more time to prepare for the inevitable alien assault, but before they know it they’re here, and stronger than ever. Prominence and Diamond Dust have joined forces to make the strongest team yet - are Mark and his crew ready for them?

setNode.title: Blizzard of Fire!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Diamond Dust and Prominence are pounding on Raimon with the full weight of their combined force, but Raimon have found a hole in their defences and are managing to fight back. There’s a lot of emotion out there on the field - it’s a powder keg and something’s about to blow!

setNode.title: Alius Academy Finally Arrives!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The secrets behind Alius Academy are beginning to bubble up to the surface and it looks like Coach Lina knows much more than she’s letting on. When confronted, she tells the team that all the answers are at Mount Fuji - so it’s off to the mountain they go. But what’s waiting for them at the top?

setNode.title: Alius Academy Unveiled!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The veil of secrecy has finally been lifted, we know who Alius Academy is and who’s behind them. But the hard part still lies ahead - Mark and the Raimon 11 have to play the ultimate team of warriors, Genesis! Do they have a hope of winning, or is this the final countdown for the Raimon 11?

setNode.title: The Final Battle - Part 1!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The final battle to end all final battles has begun. It's Raimon versus Genesis, and at the start they look totally outclassed. Unless Raimon can find some kind of secret weapon, they’ll never beat the uber soldiers of Genesis. Unless Shawn Froste can get back in the game somehow…

setNode.title: The Final Battle - Part 2!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The fate of the world rests on the outcome of the game being played at a stadium inside Mount Fuji. As inconceivable as it sounds, it’s true - and if Mark and the others can't find a way to beat Xavier and his team of inhumanly strong players, it’s all over for everybody, for all time!

setNode.title: The Endless Threat!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The final battle is over, but as we all know there are final battles and then there are Final Battles! Which is this to be? We learn the truth behind Astram and the Alius Rock, but there are still more mysteries behind the truth; mysteries that may involve a FINAL final battle to solve them!

setNode.title: The Raimon Vs Raimon Face Off!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Just when you think you have the strongest football team in the entire universe, along comes another team waiting to prove you wrong. And so it is with the Raimon 11, only this time the team challenging them is…the Raimon 11! The injured and left-behind players have been re-energised through a ghastly experiment and they’re out for blood!

setNode.title: The Ultimate Friendship Move!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The Dark Emperors are merciless and relentless and are giving Raimon a thrashing like they’ve never had before. It’s time to pull out all the stops and reach out for their hearts and minds, but it will take more than words to win this game: Mark and his teammates will need the spirit of football!

setNode.title: The World’s Strongest Team: Blizzard Version!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

The battles are over and the war has been won, but before the next surprise comes along, Shawn and Mark take a few minutes to reflect on all the battles they’ve been through and all their triumphs and defeats along their long road to victory.

setNode.title: The World’s Strongest Team: Fire Version!
setNode.description:
Available for a limited time only.

Mark and Shawn are joined in their reflecting by Axel, who has his own take on the crazy ups and downs of their long struggle against Alius Academy. Their reflections all lead to one conclusion - that they love football and that they don’t want to stop playing it: ever!

eshopLinks.label: Inazuma Eleven® GO: Chrono Stones: Wildfire (CTR)
Inazuma Eleven® GO: Chrono Stones: Thundeflash (CTR)

setNode.title: Kirby Comes to Cappy Town
setNode.description: Somewhere in space lies Dream Land, a place ruled by the selfish King Dedede, who never thinks about anyone but himself. But one day, a space ship suddenly descends from the sky, and out steps Kirby, the legendary Star Warrior!

setNode.title: A Blockbuster Battle
setNode.description: Having saved Dream Land, Kirby decides to live in Cappy Town - only King Dedede and his minions keep interfering, and he can't find anywhere to call his home! Tiff and friends decide to work together and build Kirby a house. But then...

setNode.title: Kirby's Duel Role
setNode.description: The swordsman known as Meta Knight challenges Kirby to a duel. Meta Knight seems like he has his head on his shoulders, so what is he playing at? Then, King Dedede sends Bugzzy, a sword-wielding monster, after Kirby. Watch out, Kirby!

setNode.title: Dark and Stormy Knight
setNode.description: A monster called Kracko suddenly appears in the sky, casting a dark shadow over Cappy Town. Tiff rushes to see Kabu and is surprised to also find Meta Knight, who tells her a curious secret about Kirby...

setNode.title: Beware: Whispy Woods!
setNode.description: Kirby and friends set out for a picnic, but they get lost in the woods! Then, thanks to King Dedede's trickery, Whispy Woods gets angry and starts taking it out on Kirby and the others...

setNode.title: Un-Reality TV
setNode.description: King Dedede unexpectedly gives everyone in Cappy Town a television. But the televisions are actually a trap designed to brainwash anyone who watches! Kirby is surrounded by enemies and even chased by a giant monster. Whatever will he do?!

setNode.title: Kirby's Egg-Cellent Adventure
setNode.description: The mystical bird known as Dyna Blade appears only once every hundred years. Thanks to King Dedede's wicked scheming, Kirby finds himself under attack from Dyna Blade! How can he get away from a metal-winged bird that can streak through the sky like lightning?!

setNode.title: Curio's Curious Discovery
setNode.description: Some ancient artifacts are discovered that look an awful lot like King Dedede. Even Mr. Curio admits that this must mean King Dedede is Dream Land's rightful ruler. But this all seems a little...dubious!

setNode.title: The Fofa Factor
setNode.description: King Dedede's head...on Escargoon's body?! A monster called Slice 'N' Splice has started switching everyone's heads and bodies around. Then he tells FoLolo and FaLala something shocking - they used to be one being!

setNode.title: Hail to the Chief
setNode.description: Chief Bookem falls asleep when he is supposed to be directing traffic, and as a result, King Dedede and Mayor Len Blustergas crash into each other! King Dedede gets angry and fires Chief Bookem, but then all sorts of disasters start happening in Cappy Town. What will Cappy Town do without its police chief?!

setNode.title: The Big Taste Test
setNode.description: The famous Chef Shiitake is coming to Castle Dedede! Hoping to make a good impression, Chef Kawasaki plans to serve a dish made using an extra special ingredient - one that puts Kirby on the menu!

setNode.title: Escargoon Squad
setNode.description: A ghost has appeared in Castle Dedede! Mabel the fortune teller claims that it's a real ghost with a grudge against King Dedede, but it's actually a prank played by someone who's tired of King Dedede's antics. However, even once that mystery is solved, the real terror still awaits...

setNode.title: Cappy New Year
setNode.description: As Dream Land starts its New Year's celebrations, King Dedede announces a fireworks show! Everyone in Cappy Town is very excited, but King Dedede is determined that his fireworks will be more impressive than anyone else's - and he's got a trick up his sleeve!

setNode.title: The Pillow Case
setNode.description: King Dedede gives everyone in Cappy Town a pillow - but they are secretly pillows made by N.M.E. that cause nightmares and brainwash whoever uses them!

setNode.title: Kirby's Pet Peeve
setNode.description: Tiff decides to give Kirby a playmate of his very own in the form an electronic pet. However, Kirby takes it out for a walk and soon discovers that this cute pet has a dark side!

setNode.title: A Fish Called Kine
setNode.description: Kine has feelings for Tiff?! Kine, a fish who lives in the sea around Dream Land, leaves a love letter for Tiff. King Dedede knows about this, and puts together a plan to take advantage of it. Will Kine overcome all the obstacles and get together with Tiff?

setNode.title: The Thing About the Ring
setNode.description: Every time Sir Ebrum tries to give Lady Like a ring on their anniversary, something happens and he loses it. Now it's their anniversary again, and he is determined to succeed this time. But then the ring goes missing, sending the whole town into an uproar! And the ring turns up in the most unexpected place...

setNode.title: Flower Power
setNode.description: Kirby falls into King Dedede's trap and swallows a Noddy - which could put him to sleep for a hundred years! Only one special flower can wake him, and to find it, Tuff braves the wilderness of Baba ga Hara.

setNode.title: Here Comes the Son
setNode.description: Knuckle Joe appears out of N.M.E.'s monster delivery system. He may look like a small boy, but he possesses incredible strength and starts causing big trouble in Cappy Town - with the goal of battling Kirby!

setNode.title: Dedede's Snow Job
setNode.description: King Dedede decides it's too hot and enlists the help of a monster to cool things down a bit. Unfortunately, Ice Dragon instantly plunges Dream Land into the deepest winter - and then Chilly emerges from the snow! Can Kirby fight off two monsters at once?

setNode.title: A Princess in Dis-dress
setNode.description: A princess comes to visit from another planet. King Dedede gives her a warm welcome, but the moment he meets the lovely and elegant princess, it's love at first sight - and he even asks her to marry him! Will King Dedede get to live happily ever after?

setNode.title: Island of the Lost Warrior
setNode.description: A typhoon leaves Kirby and friends stranded on a distant island, where they encounter an elderly warrior, Kit Kosmos, who mistakes them for monsters and captures them. Then they discover an unexpected connection between Kit Kosmos and Meta Knight.

setNode.title: The Empty Nest Mess
setNode.description: Dyna Blade's chick flies down from the mountains and finds itself in Cappy Town, where it gets caught up in one of King Dedede's wicked schemes. How will Kirby deal with King Dedede and a very angry Dyna Blade?

setNode.title: Ninja Binge
setNode.description: Benikage, a rather useless ninja who struggles to perform any ninja techniques, arrives in Cappy Town. Meanwhile, King Dedede summons a villanous ninja called Yamikage to steal an ancient scroll for him.

setNode.title: Escargoon Rules
setNode.description: Cappy Town has a visitor: Escargoon's mother! It turns out that Escargoon has been lying to her - he sent a letter stating that he was the ruler of Dream Land. Escargoon doesn't want to let her down, so everyone goes along with the story...but King Dedede could run out of patience at any moment!

setNode.title: Hour of the WolfWrath
setNode.description: When a monster called WolfWrath sets Castle Dedede ablaze, Meta Knight fights him and loses, but Sword Knight and Blade Knight rise up to fight on behalf of their master. The exciting story behind Sword and Blade's deep loyalty to Meta Knight is revealed!

setNode.title: The Flower Plot
setNode.description: One day, Whispy Woods wakes up and spots a single flower blooming by his roots. He cares for it deeply, and names it Lovely. But King Dedede formulates a plot to dig up the forest and turn it into a golf course - and it involves kidnapping Lovely!

setNode.title: Labor Daze
setNode.description: King Dedede builds a factory, and the residents of Cappy Town think it's something fun to do and are happy to keep working there for free. But when their work is finished, it turns out they've built a huge Ice Dragon Robot!

setNode.title: Hot Shot Chef
setNode.description: After eating one too many of Chef Kawasaki's inedible meals, King Dedede summons an expert foreign chef to completely revolutionise Cappy Town's cuisine. But this master chef is really a monster chef, and Kirby's on the menu!

setNode.title: Hatch Me if You Can
setNode.description: One day, Kirby wakes up to find himself sitting on an egg! Kirby is very puzzled, but he dutifully keeps it warm, and at last it hatches. But the baby is a Mini Galbo, and it's out of control! Is Kirby really ready to raise a child?

setNode.title: Abusement Park
setNode.description: Castle Dedede is made into a giant theme park! When the people of Cappy Town hear that it's free entry, they're in there like a flash - and when a karaoke contest is announced, everyone wants the fabulous prize that's on offer. But when Kirby takes the stage, everything takes a turn for the worse...

setNode.title: A Dental Dilemma
setNode.description: King Dedede loves sweets but hates brushing his teeth. Escargoon tells him to be more careful in case he gets cavities, but King Dedede insists that his teeth will be fine. Soon enough, however, he's howling with pain! And yet, since he's scared of the dentist, he orders a monster from N.M.E. that he hopes can fix his cavity instead...

setNode.title: Junk Jam
setNode.description: Out of nowhere, Dream Land becomes home to a pile of rubbish bigger than anyone has ever seen. Not only that, but it keeps growing day by day, and there's nothing they can do about it! King Dedede gets a monster to try and burn it, but that causes its own set of problems...

setNode.title: A Recipe for Disaster
setNode.description: Chef Kawasaki's mentor, Chef Shiitake, makes an unexpected visit to Cappy Town...and this time it's the real deal, not a monster in disguise! But the famous Chef Shiitake isn't as innocent as he seems - it turns out he's putting a chemical in his food that can manipulate people's taste buds!

setNode.title: The Kirby Derby - Part I
setNode.description: After a go-karting run-in with Tuff, King Dedede announces a Grand Prix in Cappy Town - and, naturally, that he will be racing in it! Even Kirby enters, in his newly-repaired space ship. Cappy Town is decked out in racing colours, ready for the rush of a lifetime!

setNode.title: The Kirby Derby - Part II
setNode.description: The race is going full throttle! Kirby battles hard against King Dedede's royal racecar, and turns the whole thing around by transforming into Wheel Kirby! But who will be first to the finish line?

setNode.title: Watermelon Felon
setNode.description: King Dedede secretly films Kirby and edits the footage together in a way that makes him look like a villain! Everyone eyes Kirby with suspicion, but when Meta Knight proclaims sometimes that the pen is mightier than the sword, Tiff knows it's time to take action.

setNode.title: A Novel Approach
setNode.description: Channel DDD's viewing figures finally reach rock bottom, and it's all because everyone is obsessed with a new bestselling novel. King Dedede is left out of all the excitement because he can't read, so he steals everyone's books to make sure no one else can enjoy the story either. But what will happen when he brings the author to Castle Dedede?

setNode.title: Escar-gone
setNode.description: Escargoon falls victim to a horrifying monster called Erasem! Erasem has the power to make everyone completely forget about a person's existence, leaving them terribly lonely. With everyone treating him like a stranger, how can Escargoon make them all remember who he is?

setNode.title: Monster Management
setNode.description: Knuckle Joe comes back to Cappy Town - but now he's working for N.M.E.! He wears Kirby down by sending hundreds of small monsters to attack Cappy Town, then goes in for the big finish by forming a tag team with Masher, N.M.E.'s strongest monster! How will Kirby get out of this one?

setNode.title: Prediction Predicament - Part I
setNode.description: King Dedede is in a state of panic! He keeps dreaming about a giant, flaming Kirby shooting down from the sky. He blames Kirby and sends a monster after him, but it turns out he's actually having premonitions of an asteroid heading towards Dream Land!

setNode.title: Prediction Predicament - Part II
setNode.description: Mabel's prediction comes true - an asteroid is heading straight for Dream Land, and will destroy it in 48 hours! But just as everyone has given up hope, Tiff sets a plan in motion. Will firing up the cannons of Castle Dedede be enough to save Dream Land?

setNode.title: Sheepwrecked
setNode.description: Sheep are normally such docile creatures, living out their days in peace, but one bad sheep has decided he wants to live like a wolf instead! He gets the other sheep to join his pack and help him take over Cappy Town. Then things get even worse when he reveals his monstrous true form!

setNode.title: War of the Woods
setNode.description: Things are looking bad for Whispy Woods' wise old friend Acore. King Dedede plans to level his area of the forest and build a country club there! Kirby bands together with a group of forest friends, but will it be enough to stop King Dedede's dastardly plan?

setNode.title: Scare Tactics - Part I
setNode.description: It's Halloween - and that means it's time for the annual Spook Out! Everyone gradually gets too scared to continue, until finally Kirby and his friends take the prize. But suddenly the sky grows dark, and they see a creepy-looking house. They run inside to get out of the rain, but soon find themselves trapped inside...

setNode.title: Scare Tactics - Part II
setNode.description: It seems like the house really is haunted! All sorts of unsettling things start happening. King Dedede and Escargoon accidentally wander into the mansion as well, and they all try to escape together. They don't realise it's an N.M.E. plot until it's too late, and they are already at the mercy of N.M.E.'s latest monster, Gabon!

setNode.title: Pink-Collar Blues
setNode.description: King Dedede gets the latest domestic servant robot, and soon finds he has no need for his Waddle Dees anymore! Meanwhile, Mr. Curio gets Kirby to transform into a Waddle Dee and infiltrate their ranks. What will Kirby discover amongst the Waddle Dees?!

setNode.title: Tourist Trap
setNode.description: King Dedede conspires to turn Dream Land into a tourist attraction, and Dream Land is overrun with bad-mannered tourists. However, they soon lose interest - it turns out Dream Land just isn't that exciting as a tourist destination. To satisfy their need for more action, King Dedede downloads a monster called Flame Feeder and sets it loose. This can't end well!

setNode.title: Cartoon Buffoon
setNode.description: Sensing a way to make big money, King Dedede enlists the residents of Cappy Town to help him make a cartoon. But as the airdate gets closer and closer, the animation studio quickly grows into a hectic war zone! Will they manage to get the cartoon finished in time?

setNode.title: Don't Bank On It
setNode.description: King Dedede gives everyone in Cappy Town a free doll, claiming that if you leave one under your pillow, it will make you happy. Everyone goes along with this, only to discover that the dolls have put them under a spell that lets King Dedede control them! But just as they realise this, something starts to look strange about King Dedede...

setNode.title: Kirby Takes the Cake
setNode.description:
Final episode of the series.

One day, everyone suddenly starts being cold and distant towards Kirby. Nobody wants to play with him at all! Kirby gets upset, thinking that nobody likes him anymore, and decides to run away from home. But the truth is, everyone is putting together a surprise party for him!

setNode.title: Let’s Play Soccer!
setNode.description: Mark Evans is the captain of the Raimon Middle School’s long-neglected soccer club. With the club on the verge of being disbanded Mark is hoping to kick it into shape, but he’ll need a little help and more than a little luck. Will he get it in time?

setNode.title: Royal is Here!
setNode.description: Raimon have gotten their first piece of good news, they’re going to play an exhibition game! Except that the game is against the toughest team in the whole country. As they take to the field all looks hopeless, unless somebody can pull a miracle out of a hat somewhere!

setNode.title: Here Comes the Killer Shot!
setNode.description: The team are still on a high from their surprise win against Royal Academy, but there’s a lot of work they still need to do. Kevin is mad at himself and jealous of Axel for scoring the winning shot. If only he could come up with a killer shot of his own!

setNode.title: Here Comes the Dragon!
setNode.description: It’s game day for Raimon and they’re playing a team that everyone’s nervous about - Occult Jr High. They’ve got some creepy tricks up their sleeve and unless Mark and the rest of the team can figure out how to break the spell they don’t have a hope in...heck!

setNode.title: Where’s the Notebook?
setNode.description: The Soccer Frontier Tournament is about to start and Raimon are up against the terrifying jumpers of Wild Junior High in their first game. Everyone agrees that unless they come up with a new move, Raimon are finished before they even start. Just when all hope is lost, Mark finds another hidden notebook his grandfather left behind!

setNode.title: This is the Inazuma Drop!
setNode.description: Raimon are all pumped up and ready for their big game against Wild Junior High, all except one player - Jack Wallside. His fear of heights is getting in the way of the Inazuma Drop, and without it all is lost. Will he get over it in time to save the day?

setNode.title: Showdown at the Riverbank!
setNode.description: Raimon are training hard for the next game in the Soccer Frontier Tournament, and people are beginning to sit up and take notice; including their next opponents - Brainwashing Jr High. The trouble is Brainwashing have them all figured out, and if Raimon want to beat them they have to move up to the next level!

setNode.title: The Terrifying Soccer Cyborgs!
setNode.description: It’s another big game for Raimon, against the robots of Brainwashing Jr High. Nobody’s ever scored a goal against them, much less won, but if Raimon want to advance they have to do just that. But how will they do that when their chances of winning are so small?

setNode.title: Willy Rising!
setNode.description: Axel Blaze is injured and out of Raimon’s next game, but their opponents are the weakest team in the whole tournament, so winning shouldn’t be a problem. But wait - these geeky guys aren’t as weak as everybody thinks! Our boys are in trouble, but help comes from an unlikely hero.

setNode.title: The Spy from Royal!
setNode.description: Raimon Jr Soccer Club is looking stronger than ever, but so are the forces in league against them. But so desperate are their enemies to stop them from succeeding at any cost, they cross the line and unwittingly expose themselves!

setNode.title: Find a New Coach!
setNode.description: The big game against Royal is only a few days away, but unless Raimon Jr can find a new coach then they’re going out without even setting foot on the field! The whole team is looking high and low and the clock is ticking; will they find one or not?

setNode.title: The Finals - Royal Academy First Half!
setNode.description: The boys arrive at Royal Academy for the biggest game of their lives, but before they can begin they have to dispel the cloud of suspicion hanging over the place. Ray Dark has set some kind of trap, but what? And when will it spring?

setNode.title: The Finals - Royal Academy Second Half!
setNode.description: With Ray Dark safely shut away, the game against Royal has properly begun, and it’s a real game this time, not a walkover. It’s neck and neck and back and forth and the air is full of penguins. Whoever wins this comes out on top - this game is off the hook!

setNode.title: The Legendary 11!
setNode.description: The boys still can't believe they beat Royal and are the new District Champion. After the celebratory dust settles, a mysterious figure walks into Seymour’s noodle bar. Is he really from the legendary Inazuma 11? And did he just challenge them to a game?

setNode.title: This is it - The Nationals Tournament!
setNode.description: The Raimon 11 have set their sights on the National tournament and they’re determined to win it all. They’re working hard to get there, but there are lots of obstacles - first there’s the threat to their precious clubhouse, and then there’s the possibility that Nathan might leave the team - the decision’s in his hands - what will he do?

setNode.title: Soccer - Ninja Style!
setNode.description: With Nathan still on the team, for now, the Raimon 11 can move forward and concentrate on the Nationals. And they’ll need to - their first game is against the speedy Shuriken High. If they don’t win this, the dream is over before it’s even begun!

setNode.title: Jude’s Decision
setNode.description: The narrow victory over Shuriken has given Raimon confidence, but on the other side of the tournament there’s shock and awe at Royal’s complete destruction at the hands of Zeus Jr. If Raimon are going to handle them, they’ll need to train even harder, and maybe even recruit some new members!

setNode.title: Break the Unbreakable Wall!
setNode.description: With their firepower boosted by the addition of Jude Sharp, the team are ready to tackle Farm Jr High and their unbreakable defence. But unless they get their passes coordinated then all their hard work will come to nothing!

setNode.title: The Reincarnated Genius!
setNode.description: Erik the Eagle is back! Like a phoenix he has risen from the ashes and come back to visit his old friend. Just in time too, Raimon Jr are desperate for some new moves, and the Tri Pegasus is just what they need. But can they perfect it in time?

setNode.title: The Killer Triangle Z!
setNode.description: Raimon Jr are getting ready to play their next big opponent - Kirkwood Jr High, which just happens to be Axel Blaze’s old school. Certain members of that team still carry a grudge against him and will stop at nothing to get their revenge. Are Raimon strong enough to overcome their hatred?

setNode.title: The Clash with Kirkwood Jr High!
setNode.description: The Murdock brothers and their grudge are dominating Raimon Jr at every turn, but they need to find the strength to overcome their malice if they’re going to make it to the final. If they don’t work together, their dream is finished!

setNode.title: Go Beyond the God Hand!
setNode.description: Raimon Jr are through to the finals, but they’re all getting nervous about playing the terrifying Zeus Jr. Mark is convinced he’s not good enough, and if that weren’t enough to rattle nerves, it seems that Ray Dark is working on some fiendish plot behind the scenes. Will he sabotage Raimon Jr?

setNode.title: A Challenge from a God!
setNode.description: As the final against Zeus draws nearer, so does Raimon Jr’s anticipation and dread. The team are working hard, but the level they have to reach seems beyond their grasp. Will they get it together in time for the final?

setNode.title: Time for Training Camp!
setNode.description: The big game is almost on top of them but Mark still hasn’t mastered Majin the Hand. The coach decides to try a new tactic and everyone spends the night at school at a sleepover training camp. Hopefully this will give Mark the skills he needs. If it doesn’t Raimon are in big trouble!

setNode.title: The Final Battle!
setNode.description: This is it, the final of the Nationals has arrived. Zeus Jr storm to an early lead and nothing Raimon Jr does has any effect on them. Are they really gods? Or is something else going on? Either way, if Raimon don’t turn the game around they’re going to get annihilated!

setNode.title: God vs Majin!
setNode.description:
Final episode of the series.

Raimon Jr are down by three goals and are getting clobbered by the soccer gods of Zeus Jr. The situation looks completely hopeless and the clock is running down. But just when all seems lost, little glimmers of hope appear. Will they be enough to shine the light of victory on Raimon?
